Subject for 2SV login email
translation: Roblox 帳號 {accountName} 的驗證碼

description: Plain body for 2SV login email
english: {geoLocationInformation}Login code for {accountName}: {lineBreak}{lineBreak} {code} {lineBreak}{lineBreak}Enter this code into the 2-Step Verification screen to finish logging in. This code will expire in 15 minutes. {lineBreak}{lineBreak}This email was sent because your account tried to login to Roblox from a new browser or device. If you haven't tried logging into Roblox, someone else may be trying to access your account. You are strongly advised to change your password if you did not generate this request. {lineBreak}{lineBreak}Resources: {lineBreak}Change Your Password [{accountInfoPageLink}] {lineBreak}Learn More About 2-Step Verification [{twoStepVerificationHelpArticleLink}]{lineBreak}Keeping Your Account Safe [{keepAccountSafeArticleLink}] {lineBreak}General Roblox Support [{supportPageLink}] {lineBreak}{lineBreak}Thank you, {lineBreak}{lineBreak}The Roblox Team
translation: {geoLocationInformation}{accountName}的登入碼：{lineBreak}{lineBreak} {code} {lineBreak}{lineBreak}在雙步驟驗證畫面輸入此登入碼即可完成登入。此代碼將在 15 分鐘後到期。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}寄送此電子郵件是因為正在嘗試從新的瀏覽器或裝置以您的帳號登入 Roblox。若您並未嘗試登入 Roblox，可能有其他人試圖存取您的帳號。若您並未發出此要求，極力建議您變更密碼。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}資源：{lineBreak}變更您的密碼 [{accountInfoPageLink}] {lineBreak}進一步瞭解雙步驟驗證 [{twoStepVerificationHelpArticleLink}]{lineBreak}保持您的帳號安全 [{keepAccountSafeArticleLink}] {lineBreak}一般 Roblox 支援 [{supportPageLink}] {lineBreak}{lineBreak}感謝您{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 團隊敬上

description: Html body for 2SV login email
english: {geoLocationInformation}{spanStartTagWithBold}Login code for {accountName}: {lineBreak}{lineBreak}{code} {spanEndTag}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Enter this code into the 2-Step Verification screen to finish logging in. This code will expire in 15 minutes.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}This email was sent because your account tried to login to Roblox from a new browser or device. If you haven't tried logging into Roblox, someone else may be trying to access your account. You are strongly advised to change your password if you did not generate this request.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Resources:{lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{ChangePasswordLink}{hrefEnd}Change Your Password{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{TwoStepVerificationArticleLink}{hrefEnd}Learn More About 2-Step Verification{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{AccountSafetyArticleLink}{hrefEnd}Keeping Your Account Safe{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{SupportLink}{hrefEnd}General Roblox Support{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{lineBreak}Thank you,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}The Roblox Team
translation: {geoLocationInformation}{spanStartTagWithBold}{accountName}的登入碼：{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{code} {spanEndTag}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}在雙步驟驗證畫面輸入此登入碼即可完成登入。此代碼將在 15 分鐘後到期。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}寄送此電子郵件是因為正在嘗試從新的瀏覽器或裝置以您的帳號登入 Roblox。若您並未嘗試登入 Roblox，可能有其他人試圖存取您的帳號。若您並未發出此要求，極力建議您變更密碼。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}資源：{lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{ChangePasswordLink}{hrefEnd}變更您的密碼{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{TwoStepVerificationArticleLink}{hrefEnd}進一步瞭解雙步驟驗證{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{AccountSafetyArticleLink}{hrefEnd}保持您的帳號安全{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{SupportLink}{hrefEnd}一般 Roblox 支援{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{lineBreak}感謝您{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 團隊敬上

english: {paragraphStart}Hello,{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}{emphasisStart}{code}{emphasisEnd} is your Roblox 2-Step Verification code for {emphasisStart}{accountName}{emphasisEnd}.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}Enter the above code into the 2-Step Verification screen to finish logging in. This code will expire in 15 minutes.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}This login request was received from {emphasisStart}{geoLocationInformation}{emphasisEnd}.{paragraphEnd}{lineBreak}{paragraphStart}Thank You,{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}The Roblox Team{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}
translation: {paragraphStart}您好，{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}您的 Roblox 帳號 {emphasisStart}{accountName}{emphasisEnd} 的雙步驟驗證碼是 {emphasisStart}{code}{emphasisEnd}。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}在雙步驟驗證頁面輸入此驗證碼即可完成登入。此驗證碼將會在 15 分鐘後失效。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}此登入請求來自 {emphasisStart}{geoLocationInformation}{emphasisEnd}。{paragraphEnd}{lineBreak}{paragraphStart}謝謝您，{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}Roblox 團隊{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}

description: Footer of the two step verification login email.
english: Do not reply to this email directly. You are receiving this email because there was a Roblox login attempt from a new browser or device. If you did not make this request, you are strongly advised to change your password.
translation: 請勿直接回覆此電子郵件。您因為有人嘗試使用新的瀏覽器或裝置登入 Roblox 而收到此電子郵件。若您沒有進行此請求，我們強烈建議您變更您的密碼。

translation: 已停用 Roblox 帳號 {accountName} 的驗證器 App 雙步驟驗證

english: Hello {accountName},{lineBreak}{lineBreak}This message is to notify you that our support team has deactivated 2-Step Verification with Authenticator for your Roblox account. This typically occurs due to a support ticket you submitted or as a security measure to ensure the safety of your account. A security code from an Authenticator app will no longer be required for some actions like logging in. You can reactivate 2-Step Verification in your {aTagStartWithHref}{AccountSettingsPageLink}{hrefEnd}account settings{aTagEnd}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}If you need further assistance, {spanStartTagWithBold}do not reply to this email{spanEndTag}, and reply to your existing support ticket or submit a new support request here: {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}Roblox Support{aTagEnd}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox
translation: {accountName} 您好，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}我們想讓您知道我們的客服團隊已為您的帳號停用驗證器雙步驟驗證。我們通常會因您傳送的客服表格或為了確保您的帳號安全而採取此行動。您登入或進行部分操作時將不再需要使用驗證器 App 的安全碼。您可以在{aTagStartWithHref}{AccountSettingsPageLink}{hrefEnd}帳號設定{aTagEnd}頁面重新啟用雙步驟驗證。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若需更多協助，{spanStartTagWithBold}請勿直接回覆此電子郵件{spanEndTag}。請在原本的客服表格回覆，或在此填寫新的客服表格：{aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}Roblox 客服{aTagEnd}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox

english: Hello,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}This message is to notify you that our support team has deactivated 2-Step Verification with Authenticator on your child's Roblox account, {accountName}. This typically occurs due to a support ticket you submitted or as a security measure to ensure the safety of your account. A security code from an Authenticator app will no longer be required for some actions like logging in. You can reactivate 2-Step Verification in {aTagStartWithHref}{AccountSettingsPageLink}{hrefEnd}account settings{aTagEnd}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}If you need further assistance, {spanStartTagWithBold}do not reply to this email{spanEndTag}, and reply to your existing support ticket or submit a new support request here: {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}Roblox Support{aTagEnd}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox

english: {geoLocationInformation}{spanStartTagWithBold}Virtual transaction code for {accountName}: {lineBreak}{lineBreak}{code} {spanEndTag}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Enter this code into the 2-Step Verification screen to finish verifying your virtual transaction. 您即將把帳號還原成之前的狀態。

description: Subject line for the username reminder email, which provides the user with all of the usernames associated with their email address.
Header in the username reminder email
First part of the username reminder email. This text appears before a list of usernames associated with this email address.
english: {paragraphStart}Hello,{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}You have requested a reminder for the Roblox accounts associated with this email address. Your accounts are listed below:{paragraphEnd}

description: Second part of the username reminder email. This text appears after a list of usernames associated with this email address.
Footer text displayed at the bottom of the username reminder email.
english: You are receiving this email because there has been a request to recover Roblox usernames associated with this email address. If you did not make this request, do not reply to this email directly. Please contact {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}Roblox Support{aTagEnd} and change your password immediately
translation: 您因為有人請求取回此電子郵件地址對應的 Roblox 使用者名稱而收到此電子郵件。若您沒有進行此請求，請勿直接回覆此電子郵件，您應聯絡 {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}Roblox 客服人員{aTagEnd}並立刻變更密碼。

description: Informative links displayed at the bottom of the username reminder email. Account safety goes to http://www.roblox.com/info/account-safety and Support goes to http://www.roblox.com/info/help

translation: 顯示 Captcha 時發生未知錯誤。

translation: 嘗試次數過多，請稍後再試。

english: Your current password is incorrect, the password was not changed.
translation: 您目前的密碼不正確，密碼並未變更。

english: Must include new password and confirm password
translation: 必須輸入並確認新密碼

translation: 新密碼與確認密碼欄位必須相符

english: Who can find me by my phone number?
translation: 誰可以透過我的手機號碼找到我？

english: This setting controls who can find you using the phone number you provided.

忘記密碼或使用者名稱

english: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
translation: 嘗試次數過多，請稍後再試。

translation: 您似乎在以過去的使用者名稱登入，請以新的使用者名稱登入。

translation: 您的使用者名稱或密碼不正確，請重新嘗試。

translation: 我們需要進行真人驗證。

translation: 您輸入的文字與圖片不符，請重新嘗試。

translation: 系統錯誤，請返回登入畫面。

translation: 若要完成驗證，請登入 Roblox。

translation: 對不起，密碼重置請求在 {expirationHour} 小時 {expirationMinute} 分鐘後失效。請重新嘗試請求。

description: Subject for password reset email

reset password email body
english:
We noticed that the password changed for your Roblox account: {userName}. If you didn't intend to change it, or you think someone else changed it by mistake, please click this link to undo the action:
{urlShown}

If you are happy with your new Roblox password, you don't have to do anything! It's already set up. Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please see the Roblox help page (https://www.roblox.com/help).
translation:
我們發現您變更了您的帳號 {userName} 的密碼。若您沒有要變更您的密碼，請按下此連結復原您的密碼：
{urlShown}

若您有變更密碼，您的變更已經生效，您不需要採取任何動作。請勿回覆此電子郵件。若您有任何問題，請前往 Roblox 協助頁面（https://www.roblox.com/help）。

description: Password Reset Email Body
english:
Dear {userName},

We noticed you have changed the password for your account. If you didn't intend to change it, or you think someone else changed it by mistake, then we need you to contact customer service (https://www.roblox.com/support) to change the password back. That way we will know for sure that your account is secure and safe.

If you are happy with your new password on Roblox, you don't have to do anything! It's already set up.

Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please see the Roblox help page (https://www.roblox.com/help).
translation:
{userName} 您好，

我們發現您已變更您的密碼。若您沒有要變更您的密碼，或者認為有人不小心變更您的密碼，請聯絡客服人員（https://www.roblox.com/support）將密碼改回，確保帳號安全。

若您有變更密碼，您的變更已經生效，您不需要採取任何動作。

請勿回覆此訊息。若您有任何問題，請前往 Roblox 支援中心（https://www.roblox.com/help） 。

That way we will know for sure that your account is secure and safe.

If you are happy with your new password on Roblox, you don't have to do anything! It's already set up.
Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please see the Roblox help page (https://www.roblox.com/help).

english: Custom - Control your own settings. Default - Enable chat and messages with Friends. Off - Disables chat and messages.
translation: 自訂：控制您自己的設定。預設 ：啟用好友聊天與訊息。關閉：停用聊天與訊息。

english: This setting controls who this user will be allowed to chat with in the app and on the web (separate from in experience). The setting also prevents this user from posting on group walls.
translation: 此設定控制此使用者可以在 App 及網頁中的聊天對象（但無法控制體驗中的聊天對象）。此設定也禁止此使用者在群組動態牆上貼文。

english: This setting controls who this user will be allowed to chat with in experience.
translation: 此設定控制此使用者可以在體驗中聊天的對象。

english: This setting controls who can join this user in VIP servers - servers that can only be joined by invitation of the server owner.
translation: 此設定控制誰可以在 VIP 伺服器中加入這位使用者；VIP 伺服器是只可以透過伺服器主人邀請加入的伺服器。

english: This setting controls who can see which experience I'm in and join me in my server. Selecting no one means no one can follow me into my specific server, but I will be interacting with other users.
translation: 此設定控制誰可以看到我在參訪的體驗，並加入我的伺服器。若選擇「沒有人」，將不會有人跟隨我加入我的伺服器，但我仍會在體驗裡和其他使用者交流。

english: This setting controls who this user can receive messages from in their messages inbox.
translation: 此設定控制此使用者可以從哪些使用者收到訊息。

english: Dear Roblox user,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}We are pleased that you have chosen to secure your {username} account by providing an email address.{lineBreak}By verifying the email address associated with your Roblox account, you enable a higher level of account security.{lineBreak}Please click the button below to complete the verification process.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{verificationLink}{targetBlank}{buttonStart}Verify Email{buttonEnd}{aTagEnd}
translation: 親愛的 Roblox 使用者您好，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}很高興您提供電子郵件地址保護您的帳號 {username}。{lineBreak}電子郵件地址經過驗證後，您的帳號將會更安全。{lineBreak}請按下下方按鈕完成驗證程序。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{verificationLink}{targetBlank}{buttonStart}驗證電子郵件{buttonEnd}{aTagEnd}

description: Email body of verification email that is sent out when an over 13 user adds an email to the account
english: Dear Roblox user,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}We are pleased that you have chosen to secure your {username} account by providing an email address.{lineBreak}By verifying the email address associated with your Roblox account, you enable a higher level of account security.{lineBreak}Please click the link below to complete the verification process{lineBreak}{verificationLink}.
translation: 親愛的 Roblox 使用者您好，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}很高興您提供電子郵件地址保護您的帳號 {username}。{lineBreak}電子郵件地址經過驗證後，您的帳號將會更安全。{lineBreak}請按下下方連結完成驗證程序：{lineBreak}{verificationLink}。

description: Email body of verification email that is sent out when an under 13 user adds an email to the account
english: Hello,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Your child created the account {boldTagStart}{username}{boldTagEnd} on Roblox, an online entertainment platform that enables kids to imagine, create, and play together in immersive, user-generated 3D worlds. Our platform also provides a free development tool called “Roblox Studio” that allows users to create anything they imagine, from simple drag-and-drop building experiences to complex multiplayer games. Millions of kids have used Roblox to imagine what it’s like to create the ultimate theme park, compete as a professional race car driver, star in a fashion show, or simply build a dream home and hang out with friends.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}This email is to inform you that your child has provided us with a username, date of birth, and a parent’s email address. The parent’s email address is only used for account management, password resets if the child forgets their password, and to notify parents of changes to the child’s account access. To verify your email address, please click the button below: {lineBreak}{lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{verificationLink}{hrefEnd}{buttonStart}Verify Email{buttonEnd}{aTagEnd}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{boldTagStart}About Roblox{boldTagEnd}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox is dedicated to building an enjoyable, family-friendly environment. We are constantly evolving our safety features and working with digital safety experts to ensure that all players have a safe, comfortable place to play, chat, and collaborate on creative projects. We recommend that you visit our Parent’s Guide to help yourself get acquainted with our platform and find helpful tips for creating a positive experience for your kids on Roblox: {aTagStartWithHref}{parentalPageLink}{hrefEnd}{parentalPageLink}{aTagEnd}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox also offers {boldTagStart}parental controls{boldTagEnd}. Parents can enable a parent PIN and change their child’s communication and chat settings. You can find these controls by visiting the security and privacy tabs in the account settings while logged into your child’s account.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}To add a parent PIN, please visit: {aTagStartWithHref}{accountSecurityLink}{hrefEnd}{accountSecurityLink}{aTagEnd}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}To change chat settings, please visit: {aTagStartWithHref}{accountPrivacyLink}{hrefEnd}{accountPrivacyLink}{aTagEnd}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{boldTagStart}Privacy{boldTagEnd}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}You may remove your child's account by contacting customer service at {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}{supportPageLink}{aTagEnd}. Your email will not be used for any other purpose, disclosed to third parties, or combined with any other personal information collected from your child. Please review our privacy policy for more information at {aTagStartWithHref}{privacyPageLink}{hrefEnd}{privacyPageLink}{aTagEnd}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Thank you,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}The Roblox Team {lineBreak}{lineBreak} Do not reply to this email directly. {lineBreak}{lineBreak} {aTagStartWithHref}{robloxWebsiteLink}{hrefEnd}{robloxWebsiteLink}{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{lineBreak} {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}{supportPageLink}{aTagEnd}
translation: 您好，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}您的小孩已在 Roblox 建立帳號，使用者名稱為 {boldTagStart}{username}{boldTagEnd}。Roblox 是一個網路娛樂平台，玩家可以在我們眾多身歷其境的 3D 世界裡一起發揮想像力和同樂。玩家也可以使用我們免費的開發工具 Roblox Studio 創作簡單的模組和設計複雜的多人遊戲，盡情揮灑創意。已經有幾百萬名兒童透過 Roblox 實現他們的幻想，其中包括設計華麗的主題公園、以職業賽車手之姿和其他人競賽、成為時裝秀的焦點、化身超級英雄、邀請好友到夢寐以求的房子等等。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}我們想讓您知道您的小孩已提供我們使用者名稱、出生日期和家長的電子郵件地址。家長的電子郵件地址只會用在帳號管理、密碼重置及通知帳號使用權限更改上。請按下此按鈕驗證您的電子郵件地址：{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{aTagStartWithHref}{verificationLink}{hrefEnd}{buttonStart}驗證電子郵件地址{buttonEnd}{aTagEnd}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{boldTagStart}關於 Roblox{boldTagEnd}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 致力打造一個老少咸宜的愉快環境；我們持續地和數位安全專家增強我們的安全措施，確保所有玩家都能安心地同樂、聊天及合作。我們建議您閱讀以下的家長指南讓您更加熟悉我們的平台，並了解如何讓您的小孩的 Roblox 體驗更加豐富：{aTagStartWithHref}{parentalPageLink}{hrefEnd}{parentalPageLink}{aTagEnd}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 也備有{boldTagStart}家長監護功能{boldTagEnd}。家長可以啟用家長 PIN 碼，變更小孩的通訊與聊天設定。若要尋找這些監護功能，您可於登入小孩的帳號，並前往帳號設定中的安全性及隱私權標籤。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若要新增家長 PIN 碼，請前往：{aTagStartWithHref}{accountSecurityLink}{hrefEnd}{accountSecurityLink}{aTagEnd}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若要變更聊天設定，請前往： {aTagStartWithHref}{accountPrivacyLink}{hrefEnd}{accountPrivacyLink}{aTagEnd}。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{boldTagStart}隱私權{boldTagEnd}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若要移除您的小孩的帳號，您可以前往此處聯絡客服人員：{aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}{supportPageLink}{aTagEnd}。您的電子郵件地址不會用在其他用途、向第三方揭露或與您的小孩的個人資料合併。若您需要更多資訊，您可以前往此連結查看我們的隱私權政策：{aTagStartWithHref}{privacyPageLink}{hrefEnd}{privacyPageLink}{aTagEnd}。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}謝謝您，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 團隊 {lineBreak}{lineBreak} 請勿直接回覆此電子郵件。{lineBreak}{lineBreak} {aTagStartWithHref}{robloxWebsiteLink}{hrefEnd}{robloxWebsiteLink}{aTagEnd} {lineBreak}{lineBreak} {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}{supportPageLink}{aTagEnd}

description: Email body of verification email that is sent out when an under 13 user adds an email to the account
english: Hello,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Your child created the account {username} on Roblox, an online entertainment platform that enables kids to imagine, create, and explore together in immersive, user-generated 3D worlds. Our platform also provides a free development tool called “Roblox Studio” that allows users to create anything they imagine, from simple drag-and-drop building experiences to complex multiplayer games. Millions of kids have used Roblox to imagine what it’s like to create the ultimate theme park, compete as a professional race car driver, star in a fashion show, or simply build a dream home and hang out with friends.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}This email is to inform you that your child has provided us with a username, date of birth, and a parent’s email address. The parent’s email address is only used for account management, password resets if the child forgets their password, and to notify parents of changes to the child’s account access. To verify your email address, please click the button below:{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{verificationLink}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}About Roblox{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox is dedicated to building an enjoyable, family-friendly environment. We are constantly evolving our safety features and working with digital safety experts to ensure that all users have a safe, comfortable place to explore, chat, and collaborate on creative projects. We recommend that you visit our Parent’s Guide to help yourself get acquainted with our platform and find helpful tips for creating a positive experience for your kids on Roblox: {parentalPageLink}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox also offers parental controls. Parents can enable a parent PIN and change their child’s communication and chat settings. You can find these controls by visiting the security and privacy tabs in the account settings while logged into your child’s account.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}To add a parent PIN, please visit: {accountSecurityLink}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}To change chat settings, please visit: {chatPrivacyLink} {lineBreak}{lineBreak}Privacy{lineBreak}{lineBreak} You may remove your child's account by contacting customer service at {supportPageLink}. Your email will not be used for any other purpose, disclosed to third parties, or combined with any other personal information collected from your child. Please review our privacy policy for more information at {privacyPageLink}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Thank you,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}The Roblox Team{lineBreak}Do not reply to this email directly.{lineBreak}{robloxWebiteLink}{lineBreak}{supportPageLink}
translation: 您好，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}您的小孩已在 Roblox 建立帳號，使用者名稱為 {username}。Roblox 是一個網路娛樂平台，您的小孩可以在我們眾多身歷其境的 3D 世界裡一起發揮想像力、創作及探索。使用者也可以透過我們免費的開發工具 Roblox Studio 創作簡單的模組和設計複雜的多人遊戲，盡情揮灑創意。已經有成千上萬名兒童透過 Roblox 實現他們的幻想，其中包括設計華麗的主題公園、以職業賽車手之姿和其他人競賽、成為時裝秀的焦點、化身超級英雄、邀請好友到夢寐以求的家園玩耍等等。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}我們想讓您知道您的小孩已將使用者名稱、出生日期和家長的電子郵件地址提供給我們。家長的電子郵件地址只會用在帳號管理、密碼重置及通知帳號使用權限更改上。請按下此按鈕驗證您的電子郵件地址：{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{verificationLink}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}關於 Roblox{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 致力打造一個老少咸宜的愉快環境，我們持續地和數位安全專家增強我們的安全措施，確保所有玩家都能安心地探索、聊天及合作。我們建議您閱讀以下的家長指南讓您更加熟悉我們的平台，並了解如何讓您的小孩的 Roblox 體驗更加豐富：{parentalPageLink}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 也備有家長監護功能。家長可以啟用家長 PIN 碼，變更小孩的通訊與聊天設定。若要尋找這些監護功能，您可於登入小孩的帳號，並前往帳號設定中的安全性及隱私標籤。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若要新增家長 PIN 碼，請前往：{accountSecurityLink}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若要變更聊天設定，請前往： {chatPrivacyLink}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}隱私權{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若要移除您的小孩的帳號，您可以前往此處聯絡客服人員：{supportPageLink}。您的電子郵件地址不會用在其他用途、向第三方揭露或與您的小孩的個人資料合併。若您需要更多資訊，您可以前往此連結查看我們的隱私權政策：{privacyPageLink}。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}謝謝您，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 團隊{lineBreak}請勿直接回覆此電子郵件。{lineBreak}{robloxWebiteLink}{lineBreak}{supportPageLink}

description: DEPRECATED, DO NOT USE
english: Dear Roblox user,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}We noticed that you have changed the email address for your {username} account from {oldEmailAddress} to {newEmailAddress}. Just in case you really didn't mean to change it, or you think someone else changed it by mistake, then we need you to click this link{lineBreak}{revertAccountEmailLink}{lineBreak}to change the email back. You will also need to enter a new password. That way we will know for sure that your account is secure and safe.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}If you are happy with your new email address on Roblox you don't have to do anything! It's already set up.{lineBreak}Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions please email {robloxInfoEmailAddress}.
translation: 親愛的 Roblox 使用者您好，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}我們發現您將您的帳號 {username} 的電子郵件地址從 {oldEmailAddress} 變更為 {newEmailAddress}。若您沒有要變更你的電子郵件地址，或者認為有人不小心變更你的電子郵件地址，您可以按下 {lineBreak}{revertAccountEmailLink}{lineBreak} 復原您原本的電子郵件地址。除此之外，您也需要輸入一組新的密碼，確保您的帳號的安全。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若您有變更電子郵件地址，您的變更已經生效，您不需要採取任何動作。{lineBreak}請勿回覆此電子郵件。若您有任何問題，請聯絡 {robloxInfoEmailAddress}。

english: You have been enrolled in the Fast Track reporting program for making good abuse reports.  Your abuse reports are now Fast Tracked for review.  Stay in the program by continuing to make good abuse reports. Thank you for helping to make Roblox a positive experience!
translation: 由於您持續提交良好的檢舉報告，您已被加到快速通道企劃。您的檢舉報告將會更快受到審核。繼續提交良好的檢舉報告，即可留在快速通道計畫。感謝您協助維護 Roblox 的環境！

description: A label above a report of the Fast Track member's reporting accuracy compared to other Fast Track members.
Pronoun for the current user, who in this context is a Fast Track member. The usage here is intended to be as a heading for a column in a table.

The group of Roblox community members who are part of the Fast Track Member Role. These users, together, represent some of our most useful community reporters and their reports are given special attention.
A label for a column in a report that indicates that the column will contain months. For example "January" or "March".
A label used as a column header in a report table. This column contains "years". These will be localized. Examples for en-us "2015" and "2020"

description: Help text that explains to users how we define Accuracy of abuse reports for the Fast Track program. Intention is to help avoid user confusion about the meaning of the scores.
english: Accuracy is how often moderation agreed with abuse reports. Your number will show after you submit several reports. 'Everyone' means all of the Fast Track members as a group.
translation: 準確度為管理員同意檢舉報告的頻率，在您提交一定數量檢舉報告後將會開始顯示。「所有人」指所有快速通道成員合在一起。

description: DEPRECATED, DO NOT USE
english:
Dear {username},

We noticed you have changed your email address from {oldEmailAddress} to {newEmailAddress}. If you didn't intend to change it, or you think someone else changed it by mistake, then we need you to contact customer service (https://www.roblox.com/support) to change the email back. That way we will know for sure that your account is secure and safe.

If you are happy with your new email address on Roblox you don't have to do anything! It's already set up.
Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions please email {robloxInfoEmailAddress}.
translation:
{username} 您好，

我們發現您已電子郵件地址從 {oldEmailAddress} 變更為 {newEmailAddress}。若您沒有要變更您的電子郵件地址，或者認為有人不小心變更您的電子郵件地址，請聯絡客服人員（https://www.roblox.com/support）將電子郵件地址改回，確保您的帳號的安全。

若您有變更電子郵件地址，您的變更已經生效，您不需要採取任何動作。
請勿回覆此訊息。若您有任何問題，請聯絡 {robloxInfoEmailAddress} 。

Dear {username},

We noticed you have changed the email address from {oldEmailAddress} to {newEmailAddress}. If you didn't intend to change it, or you think someone else changed it by mistake, then we need you to contact customer support ({supportLink}) to change the email back. That way we will know for sure that your account is secure and safe.

If you are happy with your new email address on Roblox, you don't have to do anything! It's already set up.
Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please see the Roblox help page ({helpLink}).
translation:
{username} 您好，

我們發現您已電子郵件地址從 {oldEmailAddress} 變更為 {newEmailAddress}。若您沒有要變更您的電子郵件地址，或者認為有人不小心變更您的電子郵件地址，請聯絡客服人員（{supportLink}）將電子郵件地址改回，確保您的帳號的安全。

若您有變更電子郵件地址，您的變更已經生效，您不需要採取任何動作。
請勿回覆此訊息。若您有任何問題，請前往 Roblox 支援中心（{helpLink}）。

description: DEPRECATED, DO NOT USE
english:
Dear {username},

We noticed you have changed the email address from {oldEmailAddress} to {newEmailAddress}. If you didn't intend to change it, or you think someone else changed it by mistake, then we need you to contact customer support ({supportLink}) to change the email back. That way we will know for sure that your account is secure and safe.

If you are happy with your new email address on Roblox, you don't have to do anything! It's already set up.
Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please see the Roblox help page ({helpLink}).
translation:
{username} 您好，

我們發現您已電子郵件地址從 {oldEmailAddress} 變更為 {newEmailAddress}。若您沒有要變更您的電子郵件地址，或者認為有人不小心變更您的電子郵件地址，請聯絡客服人員（{supportLink}）將電子郵件地址改回，確保您的帳號的安全。

若您有變更電子郵件地址，您的變更已經生效，您不需要採取任何動作。
請勿回覆此訊息。若您有任何問題，請前往 Roblox 支援中心（{helpLink}）。

description: error message
english: The Facebook profile url is invalid.
The Twitch profile url is invalid.

Dear {username},{lineBreak}{lineBreak}We noticed that you have changed your email address from {oldEmailAddress} to {newEmailAddress}. If you made this change, feel free to disregard this email.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}If you did not make this change, or did so by mistake, please click this link to change the email back: {aTagWithHref}{revertAccountEmailLinkWithTicket}{hrefEnd}{revertAccountEmailLink}{aTagEnd}. To keep your account safe, you will be asked to set a new password.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please visit our Help Center.
translation: {username} 您好，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}我們發現您將您的電子郵件地址從 {oldEmailAddress} 變更為 {newEmailAddress}。若您有進行此變更，請忽略此電子郵件。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若您沒有要變更你的電子郵件地址，或是不小心變更了電子郵件地址，請點擊此連結改回電子郵件地址：{aTagWithHref}{revertAccountEmailLinkWithTicket}{hrefEnd}{revertAccountEmailLink}{aTagEnd}。為了確保您的帳號安全，您將會被要求設定新的密碼。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}請勿回覆此電子郵件。若您有任何問題，請前往支援中心。

english: Dear {username},{lineBreak}{lineBreak}We noticed that you have changed your email address from {oldEmailAddress} to {newEmailAddress}. If you made this change, feel free to disregard this email.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}If you did not make this change, or did so by mistake, please click this link to change the email back: {revertAccountEmailLink}. To keep your account safe, you will be asked to set a new password.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please visit our Help Center ({accountHelpLink}).
translation: {username} 您好，{lineBreak}{lineBreak}我們發現您將您的電子郵件地址從 {oldEmailAddress} 變更為 {newEmailAddress}。若您有進行此變更，請忽略此電子郵件。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}若您沒有要變更你的電子郵件地址，或是不小心變更了電子郵件地址，請點擊此連結改回電子郵件地址：{revertAccountEmailLink}。為了確保您的帳號安全，您將會被要求設定新的密碼。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}請勿回覆此電子郵件。若您有任何問題，請前往支援中心（{accountHelpLink}）。

description: DEPRECATED, DO NOT INCLUDE
english: Hello Roblox user, {lineBreaks}Your username change request has been processed. Your username was changed from {oldUsername} to {newUsername}. If you did not request a username change, seek account help from Roblox Support ({accountHelpLink}). Please do not reply to this email.
translation: Roblox 使用者您好，{lineBreaks}您的使用者名稱變更請求已處理完畢，您的使用者名稱已從 {oldUsername} 變更為 {newUsername}。若您沒有請求變更使用者名稱，請前往 Roblox 支援（{accountHelpLink}）取得協助。請勿回覆此電子郵件。

english: I am invited to a private server
translation: 有人邀請我加入私人伺服器

english: This setting controls who can join this user in private servers - servers that can only be joined by invitation of the server owner.
translation: 此設定控制誰可以在私人伺服器中加入這位使用者；私人伺服器是只可以透過伺服器主人邀請加入的伺服器。

english: Who can invite me to private servers?
translation: 誰可以邀請我加入私人伺服器？

description: Subject for email verification email, which is used to let the user confirm that their email address is associated with this roblox account.
Body text for email verification email. This comes before a button that the user can click to proceed with confirming that they want to associate this email to the given Roblox account.
english: {paragraphStart}Hello,{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}Thanks for choosing to secure your Roblox account {emphasisStart}{username}{emphasisEnd} by providing an email address.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}If you submitted this request, please click the button below to complete the verification process:{paragraphEnd}
translation: {paragraphStart}您好，{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}謝謝您提供電子郵件地址保護您的 Roblox 帳號 {emphasisStart}{username}{emphasisEnd}。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}若您有進行此請求，請按下以下按鈕完成驗證程序：{paragraphEnd}

description: Text on a button in the email verification email. Clicking this button lets the user confirm that they want this email address to be associated with their Roblox account for security purposes.
Second part of the body of the email verification email. This comes after the 'verify email' button.
Footer displayed at the bottom of the 'email verification' email.
english: Do not reply to this email directly. You are receiving this email because there has been an attempt to verify a Roblox account with your email. If you did not make this request, please disregard this email.
translation: 請勿直接回覆此電子郵件。您因為有人嘗試使用您的電子郵件地址驗證 Roblox 帳號而收到此電子郵件。若您沒有進行驗證請求，請忽略此電子郵件。

description: Informative links at the bottom of the 'email verification' email.
Subject line for the 'email verification' email for users under 13. This is sent to the parent of the user, who is responsible for taking action on authorizing the email.

First part of the body text for the 'email verification' email for users under 13. This is directed at the parent of the user. Below this text is an "I Agree, Verify Email" button that the parent can click to proceed.
english: {paragraphStart}Hello,{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}Your child created the account {emphasisStart}{username}{emphasisEnd} on Roblox, an online entertainment platform that enables kids to imagine, create, and play together in immersive, user-generated 3D worlds.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}Your child has provided us with a username, date of birth, and a parent's email address. Please confirm this email address is correct by {emphasisStart}clicking the button below to complete the validation process{emphasisEnd}. Regardless of whether you validate the parental email address or not, the child will still be able to retain their account and chat with others.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}By clicking the "I Agree, Validate Email" button you also agree that (a) You and your child agree to the Roblox {aTagStartWithHref}{termsOfServiceLink}{hrefEnd}Terms{aTagEnd}, including arbitration, and (b) You will supervise and be solely responsible for your child’s use of Roblox.{paragraphEnd}
translation: {paragraphStart}您好，{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}您的小孩 {emphasisStart}{username}{emphasisEnd} 在 Roblox 註冊了帳號。Roblox 是一個讓兒童在使用者創作的沉浸式 3D 世界裡一起想像、創作和玩樂的網路娛樂平台。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}您的小孩給我們提供了使用者名稱、出生日期及家長的電子郵件地址。為了確認電子郵件地址正確，請{emphasisStart}點擊以下按鈕完成驗證程序{emphasisEnd}。無論您有沒有驗證家長的電子郵件地址，您的小孩仍然可以使用他的帳號和其他人聊天。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}按下「我同意，驗證電子郵件地址」即表示您同意（一）您和小孩同意 Roblox {aTagStartWithHref}{termsOfServiceLink}{hrefEnd}條款{aTagEnd}和仲裁條款，以及（二）您會監督小孩的 Roblox 使用行為並單獨為其負責。{paragraphEnd}

description: Text of the button in the 'email verification' email for users under 13. The text of this button is referred to by name in the first part of the email body ('by clicking "I Agree, Validate Email"...'), so the name should be consistent.
translation: 我同意，驗證電子郵件地址

description: Second part of the body text in the 'email verification' email for users under 13. This is shown after a button that the parent can click to proceed with email verification. 'Parent's Guide to Roblox' and 'Privacy' are paragraph headers.
english: {paragraphStart}You can set your child's safety and parental control settings for their Roblox account at {aTagStartWithHref}{accountSettingsLink}{hrefEnd}{accountSettingsLink}{aTagEnd}.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}{emphasisStart}Parent's Guide to Roblox{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}We recommend that you visit our Parent’s Guide to help yourself get acquainted with our platform and find helpful tips for creating a positive experience for your kids on Roblox: {aTagStartWithHref}{parentalPageLink}{hrefEnd}{parentalPageLink}{aTagEnd}{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}{emphasisStart}Privacy{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}You may remove your child's account anytime by contacting customer service at {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}{supportPageLink}{aTagEnd}. Your email will not be used for any other purpose, disclosed to third parties, or combined with any other personal information collected from your child. Please review our privacy policy for more information at {aTagStartWithHref}{privacyPageLink}{hrefEnd}{privacyPageLink}{aTagEnd}.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}Thank You,{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}The Roblox Team{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}
translation: {paragraphStart}您可以在 {aTagStartWithHref}{accountSettingsLink}{hrefEnd}{accountSettingsLink}{aTagEnd} 修改小孩的安全與家長監護設定。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}{emphasisStart}Roblox 家長指南{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}我們建議您閱讀家長指南， 讓您可以更加了解我們的平台，以及學習如何為小孩營造正面的 Roblox 體驗：{aTagStartWithHref}{parentalPageLink}{hrefEnd}{parentalPageLink}{aTagEnd}{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}{emphasisStart}隱私{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}您可以隨時在 {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}{supportPageLink}{aTagEnd} 請求客服人員移除小孩的帳號。您的電子郵件地址將不會用在其他用途上、洩漏給第三方組織或與其他小孩提供的其他個人資訊合併。若要了解更多資訊，請在 {aTagStartWithHref}{privacyPageLink}{hrefEnd}{privacyPageLink}{aTagEnd} 閱讀我們的隱私權政策。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}謝謝您，{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}Roblox 團隊{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}

description: Footer at the bottom of the 'email verification' email for users under 13.
english: Do not reply to this email directly. You are receiving this email because there has been an attempt to verify a Roblox account with your email. If you did not make this request, please disregard this email.
translation: 請勿直接回覆此電子郵件。您因為有人嘗試使用您的電子郵件地址驗證 Roblox 帳號而收到此電子郵件。若您沒有進行驗證請求，請忽略此電子郵件。

description: Links at the bottom of the 'email verification' email for users under 13.

english: When this setting is enabled, the PIN must be provided before changing settings.
translation: 當此設定啟用時，您變更設定之前都必須輸入 PIN 碼。

english: When this setting is enabled, this account can only access content that is appropriate for all audiences. Additionally, Contact Settings (under the {linkStart}Privacy{linkEnd} page) will be set to Off.
translation: 當此設定啟用時，此帳號將只能存取適合所有年齡層的內容。另外，位於{linkStart}隱私{linkEnd}頁面的聯絡設定將設為關閉。

english: Parental Controls allow parents to choose the correct settings that will control what experiences their child can access.
translation: 家長可以使用家長監護裡的設定控制小孩可以進入的體驗。

english: This setting controls what type of experiences this user is allowed to visit.
translation: 此設定控制此使用者可以參訪的體驗類型。

english: Contact Settings are locked because Account Restrictions (under {linkStart}Parental Controls{linkEnd} page) are enabled
translation: 因帳號限制（在{linkStart}家長監護{linkEnd}頁面下）啟用中，聯絡設定已鎖定。

description: DO NOT TRANSLATE, CAN BE DELETED

translation: 家長 PIN 碼已啟用
家長 PIN 碼已停用

description: Label next to toggle for enabling email-based two step verification.
english: Email codes to confirm your identity
translation: 以電子郵件傳送驗證碼來確認您的身分

description: Label next to toggle for enabling authenticator-based two step verification.
english: Retrieve codes from an authenticator app to confirm your identity
translation: 從驗證器 App 取得驗證碼來確認您的身分

description: Requirement for enabling authenticator-based two step verification.
Displayed as help text when authenticator-based two step verification is already enabled.
english: Some actions like logging in will require you to enter a code from your authenticator. Check your authenticator app for the code.
translation: 您登入或進行部分操作時將需要在驗證器輸入驗證碼。請在驗證器 App 查看驗證碼。

english: Scan the QR code above into your authenticator app, then enter the generated code below.
translation: 將上方的 QR 碼掃入驗證器 App，並在下方輸入生成的驗證碼。

english: Enter the manual entry key above into your authenticator app, then enter the generated code below.
translation: 將上方的手動輸入碼輸入到驗證器 App，並在下方輸入生成的驗證碼。

description: Message to user for manual Authenticator code entry.
english: Can't scan the QR code? Click here for manual entry.
translation: 無法掃描 QR 碼？按下此處取得手動輸入碼。

english: QR code has expired. Please close the modal and try again.
translation: QR 碼已過期，請關閉視窗再重新嘗試。

description: The title of the dialog that asks you to input your password before generating recovery codes.
The title of the dialog displaying the newly generated recovery codes.
The description text on the dialog prompting the user to generate new recovery codes by providing their password.
english: Please enter your account password to generate new recovery codes.
translation: 若要生成新的復原碼，請輸入您的帳號的密碼。

english: These are your new recovery codes. Please save them as you will not be able to see the codes again later.
translation: 這是您的新復原碼。復原碼只會為您顯示一次，請妥善保管。

description: Check box confirming the user has saved their recovery codes.
A label on the modal for generating new recovery codes  giving notice that the number of remaining unused recovery codes will no longer work.
english: {activeCodeCount} recovery codes will become invalid when new ones are generated.
translation: {activeCodeCount} 個復原碼將在新的復原碼生成時失效。

description: Label next to button for generating two step verification recovery codes.
Help text on the two step verification recovery codes section card.
english: If you lose access to your authenticator application, use these to recover your account.
translation: 若您無法使用驗證器程式，請使用復原碼復原您的帳號。

english: You need {robuxIcon} {robuxToBuy} more to change your username. Would you like to buy more Robux?
translation: 您還需要 {robuxIcon} {robuxToBuy} 才能變更使用者名稱。您要加購 Robux 嗎？

english: To keep you and the community safe, age verification is required to access certain features on Roblox.
translation: 為了確保您和我們社群的安全，只有通過年齡驗證的帳號才可以使用部分 Roblox 功能。

description: Label next to toggle after enabling email-based two step verification.
english: Your Account is Protected via Email Verification
translation: 您的帳號已受到電子郵件驗證保護

description: Label next to button for generating two step verification recovery codes after two step verification recovery codes have already been generated.
english: Generate new one-time use recovery codes.
translation: 生成新的一次性復原碼。

description: Message to user that appears after the user has generated recovery codes.
translation: 您有 {activeCodeCount} 個未使用的復原碼。

description: Virtual transaction 2SV
english: 2-step Verification is required to make further transactions.
translation: 若要繼續交易，請完成雙步驟驗證。

english: If you change your birthday, your age will no longer be verified.
translation: 若您變更生日，您將會失去年齡驗證。

description: prompt to add screentime restrictions for children in parental controls
english: You can add restriction hours to your child's account.
translation: 您可以為小孩的帳號新增限制時間。

description: prompt for selecting restriction hours time. ex. "Blocked From 6:00 AM"
prompt for selecting restriction hours time. ex. "Blocked Until 9:00 AM"
prompt for selecting restriction days. ex. "Repeat every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday"

english: Your time zone has been updated successfully!

description: button for adding screentime restrictions
error shown when user sets screentime restrictions that allow less than 1 hour of playtime
english: People must have at least one hour of allowed time.
translation: 帳號須至少有一小時的自由時間。

description: error shown if user inputs a screentime restriction with invalid times (ex 4pm to 10am)
english: Blocked Until time must be later than the Blocked From time.
translation: 限制結束時間必須晚於限制開始時間。

description: prompts a user to update their time zone when stored time zone doesn't match current device timezone
english: Looks like you are in the time zone: {timeZone}, update time zone?
translation: 系統判斷您目前的時區為 {timeZone}，更新時區？

description: prompts user to save screentime restriction settings
english: Click on Save to update your changes.
translation: 按下儲存即可套用更新。

description: ex. Every Wednesday, Monday, Tuesday. Should include the space after "every" (if this is relevant in translated language)
heading for section where parents can add restrictions to when their children can play Roblox

english: You must select at least one day of the week.
translation: 須至少選擇一星期中的一天。

description: tooltip text for korea screentime controls
english: The Youth Protection Revision Act, commonly known as the Shutdown Law or Cinderella Law, is an act of the South Korean National Assembly which forbids children under the age of 16 to play online video games between the hours of 00:00 and 06:00.
translation: 南韓國會制定的青少年保護修訂條例禁止 16 歲以下兒童在午夜 12:00 到上午 6:00 之間進入線上遊戲。

description: tooltip label for korea screentime curfew law
english: 12am - 6am is automatically restricted and cannot be edited.
translation: 午夜 12 點到上午 6:00 為自動限制時間，無法編輯。

description: robux spend friction
english: Improve your account security. A code will be required for some actions like logging in.
translation: 加強帳號安全。您登入或進行部分操作時將需要驗證碼。

english: Your username change request has been processed. Your username was changed from {oldUsername} to {newUsername}. If you did not request a username change, please review our account help information at our {startLink}Help Center{endLink}. Please do not reply to directly to this email as replies to this email address are not received.
translation: Roblox 使用者您好，您的使用者名稱變更請求已處理完畢，您的使用者名稱已從 {oldUsername} 變更為 {newUsername}。若您沒有請求變更使用者名稱，請前往 {startLink}Roblox 支援中心{endLink}查看帳號協助資訊。請勿直接回覆此電子郵件，我們無法在此電子郵件地址接收訊息。

description: Make sure that user wants to disable email two step verification when another two step verification method exists.
english: If you turn off 2-Step Verification with Email, a security code from your email will no longer be required for some actions like logging in. Are you sure?
translation: 若關閉電子郵件雙步驟驗證，您登入或進行部分操作時將不再需要輸入電子郵件內的驗證碼。確定？

description: Make sure that user wants to disable authenticator two step verification when another two step verification method exists.
english: If you turn off 2-Step Verification with Authenticator, a security code from the Authenticator App will no longer be required for some actions like logging in. Are you sure?
translation: 若關閉電子郵件雙步驟驗證，您登入或進行部分操作時將不再需要輸入電子郵件內的驗證碼。確定？

english: You must be at least 18 years old to save screen time restrictions.
translation: 您必須 18 歲以上才可儲存使用時間限制。

english: Enabling voice chat will use your microphone input in voice enabled experiences.
translation: 啟用語音聊天時，支援語音聊天的體驗將會使用您的麥克風輸入。

english: By clicking 'Verify My Age' you will be completing an ID verification process operated by our third party service provider.
translation: 按下「驗證我的年齡」後，您將會開始由第三方服務供應商執行的身分驗證程序。

description: Subject line for the 'email verification' email for users under 13. This is sent to the parent of the user, who is responsible for taking action on authorizing the email.

First part of the body text for the 'email verification' email for users under 13. This is directed at the parent of the user. Below this text is an "I Agree, Validate Email" button that the parent can click to proceed.
english: {paragraphStart}Hello,{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}Your child created the account {emphasisStart}{username}{emphasisEnd} on Roblox, an online entertainment platform that enables kids to imagine, create, and play together in immersive, user-generated 3D worlds.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}Your child has provided us with a username, date of birth, and a parent's email address. Please confirm this email address is correct by {emphasisStart}clicking the button below to complete the validation process{emphasisEnd}. Regardless of whether you validate the parental email address or not, the child will still be able to retain their account and chat with others.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}By clicking the "I Agree, Validate Email" button you also agree that (a) You and your child agree to the Roblox Terms, including arbitration, and (b) You will supervise and be solely responsible for your child’s use of Roblox.{paragraphEnd}
translation: {paragraphStart}您好，{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}您的小孩 {emphasisStart}{username}{emphasisEnd} 在 Roblox 註冊了帳號。Roblox 是一個讓兒童在使用者創作的沉浸式 3D 世界裡一起想像、創作和玩樂的網路娛樂平台。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}您的小孩給我們提供了使用者名稱、出生日期及家長的電子郵件地址。為了確認電子郵件地址正確，請{emphasisStart}點擊以下按鈕完成驗證程序{emphasisEnd}。無論您有沒有驗證家長的電子郵件地址，您的小孩仍然可以使用他的帳號和其他人聊天。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}按下「我同意，驗證電子郵件地址」即表示您同意（一）您和小孩同意 Roblox 條款和仲裁條款，以及（二）您會監督小孩的 Roblox 使用行為並單獨為其負責。{paragraphEnd}

description:

translation: 警告：您目前同時開啟電子郵件和驗證器 App 的雙步驟驗證。為了進一步確保帳號安全，我們推薦您開啟驗證器 App 雙步驟驗證和關閉電子郵件雙步驟驗證。

translation: 此設定將會限制 13 歲以下使用者帳號的每月消費金額。此設定關閉時，帳號將會採用預設平台消費限制。

english: This setting controls notifications on spend sent to the verified parental email on the under 13 user's account. Parents who select the default will only receive email notifications when spend levels are exceedingly high in a given calendar month.
translation: 此設定控制傳送到 13 歲以下使用者帳號的已驗證家長電子郵件帳號的消費通知。選擇預設設定的家長只會在單月消費金額極高時收到電子郵件通知。

english: Dear {username},{lineBreak}{lineBreak}We noticed that you have changed your email address from {oldEmailAddress} to {newEmailAddress}. If you made this change, feel free to disregard this email.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}If you did not make this change, or did so by mistake, please click this link to change the email back: {aTagWithHref}{revertAccountEmailLinkWithTicket}{hrefEnd}{revertAccountEmailLink}{aTagEnd}. To keep your account safe, you will be asked to set a new password.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please visit our Help Center.

english: Dear {username},{lineBreak}{lineBreak}We noticed that you have changed your email address from {oldEmailAddress} to {newEmailAddress}. If you made this change, feel free to disregard this email.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}If you did not make this change, or did so by mistake, please click this link to change the email back: {revertAccountEmailLink}. To keep your account safe, you will be asked to set a new password.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please visit our Help Center.

english: You'll need Roblox Premium to exchange Robux for cash.

description: Developer exchange welcome page heading
english: Welcome to the Roblox Developer Exchange!
translation: 歡迎來到 Roblox Developer Exchange！

english: The Developer Exchange Program (also known as DevEx) allows you to earn money by creating awesome experiences on Roblox.
translation: Developer Exchange 企劃（又稱 DevEx）可以讓您透過在 Roblox 創作優質的體驗賺錢。

english: Once you earn {minCashoutValue} Robux or more, you are eligible to convert your virtual earnings to real-world cash.
translation: 您賺得 {minCashoutValue} Robux 以上時即擁有資格將虛擬貨幣轉換成真實金錢。

english: To use DevEx, you must agree to DevEx Terms of Service and meet the simple requirements set out in those Terms, some of which are as follows:
translation: 若要使用 DevEx，您必須同意 DevEx 服務條款並遵守其基本需求，其中包括：

english: Minimum of {minCashoutValue} earned Robux in your account;

translation: 擁有已驗證的電子郵件地址、
擁有{startVerifyEmailLink}已驗證{endVerifyEmailLink}的電子郵件地址
有效的 DevEx 平台帳號、

english: 13 years of age or older; and
Community member in good standing, having complied with {termLinkStart}Roblox's Terms of Use{termLinkEnd}.
translation: 持續遵守 {termLinkStart}Roblox 使用條款{termLinkEnd}，紀錄良好的社群成員。

english: You may initiate a request to exchange Robux for cash through the Developer Exchange once each calendar month.Requests are usually processed within 2 - 4 weeks. DevEx conversions are calculated in US Dollars.
translation: 您單月可以透過 Developer Exchange 進行一次將 Robux 兌現的請求，請求通常會在 2 到 4 個星期內處理完畢。DevEx 兌換率以美元計算。

english: When you meet all the requirements, you will see a "Cash Out" button on this page. Click it and follow the instructions to get your payment started.
translation: 您符合所有需求時將會在此頁面看到「兌現」按鈕，點擊之後依照指示即可開始付款作業。

english: We recommend that you familiarize yourself with the tax treatment of DevEx payments and the fees associated with different payment methods on DevEx transactions before you cash out.
translation: 在兌現之前，我們建議您先了解 DevEx 付款的課稅方式和不同 DevEx 交易付款模式的相關費用。

english: If your request is approved, and if this is your first time cashing out, you will receive an email inviting you to create an account on our DevEx portal. You will be prompted to enter your information at account creation.
translation: 若您是第一次兌現，您將會在請求被批准後收到一封邀請您在 DevEx 平台建立帳號的電子郵件。您在建立帳號時將會被要求輸入資訊。

english: Please make sure your information is entered accurately into the DevEx portal, and is kept up to date at all times.
translation: 請確保在 DevEx 平台輸入的資訊正確無誤，並持續將其更新。

english: The information you provide is used to ensure all payments comply with laws and regulations.  Inaccuracies in information provided could impact your payment.
translation: 您提供的資訊將會用來確保所有付款皆符合相關法規。當提供的資訊有誤時，您的付款可能會受到影響。

english: To add gear to your experience, find an item in the catalog and click the Add to Experience button. The item will automatically be allowed in experience, and you'll receive a commission on every copy sold from your experience page. (You can only add gear that's for sale.)
translation: 若要在您的體驗加入裝備，請在型錄中找到道具，按下「加到體驗」按鈕。此道具會自動在體驗中允許使用，而您可以從您的體驗裡販賣的道具抽成（只可以加入販賣中的裝備）。

translation: 暫時無法使用型錄，請稍後再試。

english: No news about your best friends... want to know what your best friends are up to?
translation: 沒有您的好友的消息……想知道您的好友在做什麼嗎？

english: Nearly all Roblox experiences are built by people like you. Here are some of our favorites:
translation: Roblox 體驗幾乎都是由像您一樣的人創作。以下是幾個我們最愛的體驗：

english: Get new clothing in the {linkStart} catalog {linkEnd} and customize your avatar.
translation: 從{linkStart}型錄{linkEnd}取得新衣物，自訂您的虛擬人偶。

english: Builders will enjoy visiting our multiplayer building experiences. Professional builders will want to check out Roblox Studio, our development environment on your {linkStart}Develop page{linkEnd}.
translation: 建築家都喜歡參訪我們的多人建造體驗。專業建築家可以前往{linkStart}開發頁面{linkEnd}看看我們的體驗開發環境 Roblox Studio。

english: Meet other players in-experience and send them a friend request. If you miss your opportunity you can always send a request later by {linkStart}searching{linkEnd} for their user profile.
translation: 在體驗中與其他使用者相會，並向對方傳送好友邀請。若您已離開體驗，您可以{linkStart}搜尋{linkEnd}該玩家的個人檔案，再傳送邀請。

english: No matter what you're looking for, if it's Roblox related, there are people talking about it {linkStart}here{linkEnd}.
translation: 不管您在找什麼，只要和 Roblox 有關，就有人在{linkStart}這裡{linkEnd}討論。
瀏覽 Roblox 論壇取得協助

english: No news about your best friends... want to know what your best friends are up to?
translation: 沒有您的好友的消息……想知道您的好友在做什麼嗎？
瀏覽 Roblox 論壇取得協助

english: Nearly all Roblox experiences are built by people like you. Here are some of our favorites:
translation: Roblox 體驗幾乎都是由像您一樣的人創作。以下是幾個我們最愛的體驗：

english: Get new clothing in the {linkStart} catalog {linkEnd} and customize your avatar.
translation: 從{linkStart}型錄{linkEnd}取得新服裝，自訂您的虛擬人偶

english: Visit the {avatarLinkStart}Avatar Editor{avatarLinkEnd} to customize your character. Shop for clothing items in the {catalogLinkStart}Catalog{catalogLinkEnd}.
translation: 前往{avatarLinkStart}虛擬人偶編輯器{avatarLinkEnd}自訂您的角色，或前往{catalogLinkStart}型錄{catalogLinkEnd}購買服裝。

english: Builders will enjoy visiting our multiplayer building experiences. Professional builders will want to check out Roblox Studio, our development environment on your {linkStart}Develop page{linkEnd}.
translation: 建築家都喜歡參訪我們的多人建造體驗。專業建築家可以前往{linkStart}開發頁面{linkEnd}看看我們的體驗開發環境 Roblox Studio。

english: Meet other people in-experience and send them a friend request. If you miss your opportunity you can always send a request later by {linkStart}searching{linkEnd} for their user profile.
translation: 在體驗中與其他人相會，並向對方傳送好友邀請。若您已離開體驗，您可以{linkStart}搜尋{linkEnd}對方的個人檔案，再傳送邀請。

english: No matter what you're looking for, if it's Roblox related, there are people talking about it {linkStart}here{linkEnd}.
translation: 不管您在找什麼，只要和 Roblox 有關，就有人在{linkStart}這裡{linkEnd}討論。

heading for what is Roblox section on the landing page
first paragraph under what's Roblox heading on landing page
english: Roblox helps power the imagination of people around the world. As the largest growing social experience platform, over 44 million people come to Roblox every month to create adventures, play games, roleplay, and learn with friends. We call it the ‘Imagination Platform’.
translation: Roblox 可以激發全世界的人的想像力。作為最龐大且持續成長的社交體驗平台，每個月有超過 4400 萬人在 Roblox 一起創作、遊樂、扮演及學習，我們稱之為「想像力平台」。

description: second paragraph under what's Roblox on the landing page
english: Roblox is the best place to Imagine with Friends. With the largest online user-generated experience platform, and over 15 million experiences created by users, Roblox is the #1 site for kids and teens (comScore). Every day, virtual explorers come to Roblox to create adventures, play games, role play, and learn with their friends in a family-friendly, immersive, 3D environment.
translation: Roblox 是與朋友發揮想像力的最佳場所。做為最大的使用者創作線上體驗平台，Roblox 擁有超過 1500 萬款全由使用者創作的體驗，這也使得美國公司 comScore 認證 Roblox 為兒童及青少年網站的首選。每天都有虛擬探險家前往 Roblox 老少咸宜、身歷其境的 3D 環境一起創作、遊樂、扮演及學習。

description: heading Roblox on your device
first paragraph under Roblox on your device heading on landing page
english: You can access Roblox on all modern smartphones, desktops, Xbox One, Oculus Rift, and soon on Daydream and Cardboard. Roblox adventures are accessible from any device, so players can imagine with their friends regardless of where they are.
translation: Roblox 可以透過所有現代智慧型手機、電腦、Xbox One 及 Oculus Rift 遊玩，未來也將支援 Daydream 和 Cardboard。您可以從以上裝置開始您的 Roblox 旅程，玩家隨時隨地都可以和好友發揮想像力。

description: second paragraph under Roblox on Your Device on landing page
english: You can access Roblox on PC, Mac, iOS, Android, Amazon Devices, and Xbox One. Roblox adventures are accessible from any device, so players can imagine with their friends regardless of where they are.
translation: Roblox 可以透過透過 PC、Mac、iOS、Android、Amazon 裝置及 Xbox One 遊玩。您可以從以上裝置開始您的 Roblox 旅程，玩家隨時隨地都可以和好友發揮想像力。

translation: 注意：刪除此貼文也會刪除回覆。若您選擇清除或刪除此貼文，此檢舉報告會略過濫用佇列，直接進入使用者佇列。

english: Some of the basic rules of Roblox include the following:
translation: 以下是 Roblox 的一些基本規則：

english: No dating - no asking for boyfriends or girlfriends
translation: 禁止約會、禁止找男女朋友

english: No asking real life info about each other - no asking for phone numbers or email addresses
translation: 禁止詢問彼此的現實生活狀況、禁止向他人索取電話號碼或電子郵件地址

english: Users who don't follow the rules will get a warning at first but if they keep it up we may ask them to not come to Roblox anymore. That way we can keep Roblox fun and safe!
translation: 違反規則的使用者會先收到警告，但若該使用者持續違反規則，我們可能會為了維護 Roblox 而將其永久停權。

english: This account does not have enough permissions

translation: 言語不當：髒話及成人內容

english: Asking for or Giving Private Information

translation: 帳號盜竊：網路釣魚、駭客、交易
內容不當：地點、圖像、模型

description: Body of monthly summary message sent to users.
english: The transaction history for this account can be found {htmlBoldOpen}{htmlAHrefTransactionsPage}here{htmlCloseAHref}{htmlBoldClose}.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}You are receiving this notification of monthly activities because your child is under the age of 16. You can find more information in your parental preferences associated with playtime and transactions.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox is a game that has many mini experiences in different genres such as role playing, sports, action, and many more.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox pricing policy is a freemium model with in-game purchases.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{htmlContentRatingLogoImages}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Thank you,{lineBreak}The Roblox Team{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Please do not reply to this message as it will not be delivered to the originator.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{htmlBoldOpen}{htmlAHrefAccountSafetyPage}Account Safety{htmlCloseAHref}{htmlBoldClose} | {htmlBoldOpen}{htmlAhrefSupportPage}Support{htmlCloseAHref}{htmlBoldClose}
translation: 您可以在{htmlBoldOpen}{htmlAHrefTransactionsPage}此處{htmlCloseAHref}{htmlBoldClose}查看此帳號的交易紀錄。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}您因小孩未滿 16 歲而收到這則關於小孩本月動態的通知。您可以在家長偏好裡找到更多關於遊戲時間和交易的資訊。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 裡有許多角色扮演、體育、動作等主題的小體驗。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox 的營利機制為免費增值制，使用者可以在遊戲中購買付費商品。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{htmlContentRatingLogoImages}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}謝謝您，{lineBreak}Roblox 團隊{lineBreak}{lineBreak}請勿回覆此訊息，訊息將不會傳送到寄件人。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{htmlBoldOpen}{htmlAHrefAccountSafetyPage}帳號安全{htmlCloseAHref}{htmlBoldClose} | {htmlBoldOpen}{htmlAhrefSupportPage}支援{htmlCloseAHref}{htmlBoldClose}

description: This message is to persuade the user to verify their email address on their account for a free hat.

description: This message is to notify the user that their phone number has successfully been updated and they will get a free hat.

translation: 已確認您的手機號碼。恭喜您獲得免費的帽子！

description: shown to user when we try to upsell them on linking a phone number to their account

translation: 以手機號碼保護您的帳戶！

description: shown to user when we try to upsell them on linking an email to their account
english: Protect your account with an email!
translation: 新增電子郵件地址，保護您的帳號！

description: shown to user when we try to get them to verify their email
english: Verify your email to protect your account!
translation: 驗證您的電子郵件地址，保護您的帳號！

description: shown to user when we try to get them to verify their parent's email

translation: 新增您的家長的電子郵件地址，保護您的帳號！

description: This action will launch a modal where the user can enter their parent's email

description: Variant of Action.AddEmail

description: Can we send you notifications on this computer?

description: Notify Me
Close
Enable Desktop Push Notifications
Now just click {startBold}Always Receive Notifications{endBold} in your browser, and we'll start sending you push notifications!

translation: 現在只要在瀏覽器按下 {startBold}永遠收到通知{endBold}，我們就會開始傳送推播通知給您！

description: Now just click {startBold}Allow{endBold} in your browser, and we'll start sending you push notifications!

description: Turn Push Notifications Back On
Click the green lock next to the URL bar to open up your site permissions.

translation: 按下網址列旁的綠色鎖頭開啟您的網站權限。

description: Click the drop-down arrow next to Notifications in the {startBold}Permissions{endBold} tab.
english: Click the drop-down arrow next to Notifications in the {startBold}Permissions{endBold} tab.
translation: 在{startBold}權限{endBold}標籤中，按下「通知」旁的下拉箭頭。

description: Select {startBold}Allow{endBold} to turn notifications back on.
english: Select {startBold}Allow{endBold} to turn notifications back on.
translation: 選擇{startBold}允許{endBold}重新開啟通知。

description: Select {startBold}Always allow on this site{endBold} to turn notifications back on.
english: Select {startBold}Always allow on this site{endBold} to turn notifications back on.
translation: 選擇{startBold}永遠在此網站允許{endBold}重新開啟通知。

Description shown when the catalog page is shared on Facebook or Twitter
english: Customize your avatar with a never-ending variety of clothing options, accessories, gear, and more!
translation: 以成千上萬種服裝、飾品、裝備等道具自訂您的虛擬人偶！

description: description shown when Games page is shared on Facebook or Twitter
english: Visit millions of free experiences on your smartphone, tablet, computer, Xbox One, Oculus Rift, and more.
translation: 在您的智慧型手機、平板電腦、電腦、Xbox One、Oculus Rift 等裝置盡情參訪成千上萬款免費體驗。

description: description shown on Facebook or Twitter when Roblox landing page is shared
english: Roblox is ushering in the next generation of entertainment. Imagine, create, and play together with millions of people across an infinite variety of immersive, user-generated 3D worlds.
translation: Roblox 正在開創娛樂的新世紀，在一系列使用者創作、身歷其境的 3D 世界中，和成千上萬人發揮想像力，一起創造和同樂。

description: message when a user profile is shared on Social Media
english: {userName1} is one of the millions creating and exploring the endless possibilities of Roblox. Join {userName2} on Roblox and explore together!
translation: {userName1} 正在和成千上萬人在 Roblox 一起同樂、創作、探索。現在加入我們，和 {userName2} 一起探索 Roblox 吧！

description: The game description which shows on social media, when shared
english: Check out {gameName}. It’s one of the millions of unique, user-generated 3D experiences created on Roblox. {gameDescription}
translation: 看看 {gameName}，Roblox 上數百萬種獨一無二、使用者創作的 3D 體驗之一。{gameDescription}

description: social meta tag
english: Visit {userName1}’s Inventory and see the cool items they have collected. Look out for their passes and get one for yourself! Browse through {userName2}’s collection of hats, shirts, gear, and more.
translation: 前往 {userName1} 的道具欄，看看對方收藏的酷炫道具。注意對方有哪些特權證，自己也來一張！歡迎仔細瀏覽 {userName2} 的帽子、上衣、裝備及其他道具。

description: social meta tag
english: Visit {userName}’s Favorites and see what they like. Browse through their favorite places, accessories, and a lot more. Also, find the favorite gear they use and get one for yourself!
translation: 看看 {userName} 的最愛，瀏覽他最喜愛的地點、飾品及其他套句。看看他最常用的裝備，自己也來買一件！

description: description shown on Facebook or Twitter when shared
english: Create anything you can imagine with Roblox's free and immersive creation engine. Start creating experiences today!
translation: 使用 Roblox 免費而身歷其境的創作引擎，讓您創作您所想像的一切。現在就來開始創作體驗吧！

english: You do not have permission to configure this group.

description: A message displayed to users after they click a link that takes them to a different website (like twitter or amazon etc)
A message displayed to users after they click a link that takes them to a different website (like twitter or amazon etc)
english: Heads up, Robloxian – by clicking “continue,” you will be redirected to a retail website that is not owned or operated by Roblox. They may have different terms and privacy policies.{lineBreak} Please note that you need to be over 18 to purchase products online. We hope to see you again soon!
translation: 請注意，您按下「繼續」後將會前往 Roblox 以外的購物網站。該網站非由 Roblox 擁有或控制，其條款與政策可能與 Roblox 不同。{lineBreak}您必須 18 歲以上才能在網路上購買商品。祝您購物愉快！

description: A confirmation button for a modal that displays a message to users after they click that will take them off platform (to a site like twitter, amazon etc)

A cancel button for a modal that displays a message to users after they click that will take them off platform (to a site like twitter, amazon etc). Clicking this button will close the modal and not take them off of Roblox.

english: Roblox Studio lets you create anything and release with one click to smartphones, tablets, desktops, consoles, and virtual reality devices
translation: 您可以使用 Roblox Studio 創作各式各樣的遊戲，並立刻發布到智慧型手機、平板、電腦、遊戲主機及虛擬實境裝置上。

description: heading

english: Connect with a massive audience by tapping into an incredibly enthusiastic and international community of over 50 million monthly players
translation: 融入一個每月超過五千萬名來自全球各地、充滿熱情的玩家組成的社群。

description: heading
description
english: Creators like you are getting paid for what they love to do. Our top developers are earning over $2M a year by providing in-experience purchases
translation: 像您一樣的創作者正在透過他們的創作取得報酬；我們最優秀的開發者每年可以透過體驗中買賣賺取超過 200 萬美元。

description: heading
testimonial text
english: Roblox allows me to focus on my game development and potential future career without having to worry about the financial hardships of being a college student.
translation: Roblox 讓我可以專心開發遊戲和未來的職涯，不用為身為大學生的財務狀況煩惱。

description: testimonial
english: I enjoy creating games on Roblox because it’s social. It takes the socialization of platforms like Facebook to a new level with the games and creativity of the community.
translation: 我很享受在 Roblox 創作遊戲，因為它將 Facebook 等平台的社交功能透過社群的遊戲和創意提升到新的層次。

description: testimonial
english: Roblox was so easy to get into. You can have a whole career on it because it’s such a hot platform and the team there is always providing great resources for developers.
translation: 我一下子就學會玩 Roblox 了！那麼多人在玩 Roblox，裡面的團隊也一直分享資源給開發者，你絕對可以把 Roblox 當成你的職業。

translation: 在體驗內啟用已翻譯內容

english: All entries that have been automatically captured and either have no translations or automatic translations will be cleared from your table. Note: All applicable text will be recaptured automatically.
translation: 所有自動擷取並未翻譯或經過自動翻譯的條目將會被清除。注意：所有適用文字將會重新被自動擷取。

english: Confirmed. Please note that this process may take several minutes.
translation: 已確認，作業將於幾分鐘後完成。

english: Too many attempts. Please wait before trying to clear again.
translation: 嘗試次數過多，請稍後再試。

description: modal heading

translation: 清除位翻譯的自動擷取字串

description: Represents a period - other options are 24 Hours, 3 Days, 7 Days, 30 Days

english: Automatic Translations are now available for French, German, Spanish & Portuguese. Once experience source language has been set to English, you may add and enable those languages below.
translation: 法文、德文、西文及葡文已開放自動翻譯功能。當體驗原始語言設為英文時，您可以在下方新增並啟用這些語言。

english: Enables or disables automatic translation for all experience & place basic information on enabled languages for this experience.
translation: 為此體驗啟用的語言啟用或停用所有體驗與地點基本資訊的自動翻譯。

description: Tooltip to describe functionality of the game strings and products machine translation switch
english: Enables or disables automatic translation for all experience strings & experience products on enabled languages for this experience.
translation: 為此體驗啟用的語言啟用或停用所有體驗字串與體驗產品的自動翻譯。

description: The title of Robux page
Please don't translate this one. This should be removed.

english: Get Robux to purchase upgrades for your avatar or buy special abilities in experiences. For more information on how to earn Robux, visit our {helpLinkStart}Robux Help page{helpLinkEnd}.{paragraphBreaker}Purchase Roblox Premium to get more Robux for the same price. Roblox Premium is billed every month until cancelled. {learnMoreLinkStart}Learn more here{learnMoreLinkEnd}.
translation: 取得 Robux 強化您的虛擬人偶及購買體驗內的特殊能力。若要了解如何取得 Robux，請前往 {helpLinkStart}Robux 說明頁面{helpLinkEnd}。{paragraphBreaker}購買 Roblox Premium 就能以相同價格取得更多 Robux。Roblox Premium 採月費制，直到取消為止。{learnMoreLinkStart}前往此處了解更多{learnMoreLinkEnd}。

description: The title of Subscription page

translation: 購買 Robux 時獲得額外 10%

english: Resell items and get more Robux selling your creations
translation: 轉賣道具和販賣您的作品，獲得更多 Robux

english: Trade items with other Premium members
translation: 與其他 Premium 會員交換道具

english: Joining Roblox Premium gets you a monthly Robux allowance and a 10% bonus when buying Robux. You will also get access to Roblox's economy features including buying, selling, and trading items, as well as increased revenue share on all sales in your experiences.
translation: 加入 Roblox Premium 之後，您將可以每個月領取 Robux，購買 Robux 時也將獲得 10% 獎勵。除此之外，您還能享用更多 Roblox 功能，包括購買、販賣和交易道具，和增加體驗中買賣抽成。

description: Wrong string. Do translate this.

english: By clicking "Confirm" you authorize us to charge you {price} each month until you cancel or switch subscriptions effective {renewalDate}
translation: 按下「確認」代表您授權我們從 {renewalDate} 開始每個月向您收取 {price}，直至您取消或切換訂閱。

english: We are sorry, you cannot subscribe until your current cancelled plan has expired. Please re-subscribe on {expiredDate}.
translation: 對不起，在您目前已取消的方案失效之前，您無法訂閱。請於 {expiredDate} 之後重新訂閱。

english: By clicking "Confirm" will end your Builders Club membership so you can subscribe to Roblox Premium.{newLine} You will receive a one-time payout of {robuxAmount}
translation: 按下「確認」後，您的 Builders Club 會員資格將會結束，而您將可以訂閱 Roblox Premium。{newLine}您將會收到一次性的 {robuxAmount}。

english: We are sorry, we cannot change your subscription because there is currently no package equivalent to Lifetime Builders Club.
translation: 對不起，目前沒有與 Lifetime Builders Club 相等的配套，無法變更您的訂閱。

english: Cannot find Builders Club information for this user.
translation: 找不到此使用者的 Builders Club 資訊。

english: An error occurred while updating your subscription. Please try again later.
translation: 更新您的訂閱時發生錯誤，請稍後再試。

english: A server error occurred while updating your subscription. Please try again later.
translation: 更新您的訂閱時伺服器發生錯誤，請稍後再試。

english: Your current plan is {premiumSubscription}. It will expire on {expirationDate}.
translation: 您目前的訂閱為 {premiumSubscription}，於 {expirationDate} 到期。

english: Your current plan is {premiumSubscription}. It will renew on {renewal}.
translation: 您目前的方案為 {premiumSubscription}，更新日期為 {renewal}。

english: To manage your Premium subscription, please go to your Billing settings using a browser.
translation: 若要管理 Premium 訂閱，請在瀏覽器前往帳務設定。

english: Your current plan is {premiumSubscription}. It will expire on {expirationDate}. You can repurchase or buy a new plan once your membership expires.
translation: 您目前的方案是 {premiumSubscription}，將於 {expirationDate} 到期。會員資格到期後，您可以重新購買同一個方案或購買新的方案。

english: Roblox Premium is a {durationType} subscription that costs {costPrice}. Payment will be charged to the iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Roblox Premium will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged {renewalPrice} for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings.
translation: Roblox Premium 是{durationType}費用 {costPrice} 的訂閱制度。完成購買時，我們會向您的 iTunes 帳號收費。Roblox Premium 會自動續訂，但若您目前的訂閱還剩超過 24 小時，您可以關閉自動更新。在您的訂閱結束的前 24 小時以內，我們將會向您的帳號收取 {renewalPrice}。您可以在帳號設定頁面管理訂閱與自動更新選項。

english: Roblox Premium is a monthly subscription that costs {costPrice}. Payment will be charged to the iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Roblox Premium will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged {renewalPrice} for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings. If you're under 18 make sure you have the permission of your parent or legal guardian before making a purchase. Making a purchase without permission may result in your account being deleted.
translation: Roblox Premium 是每個月費用 {costPrice} 的訂閱制度。完成購買時，我們會向您的 iTunes 帳號收費。Roblox Premium 會自動續訂，但若您目前的訂閱還剩超過 24 小時，您可以關閉自動更新。在您的訂閱結束的前 24 小時以內，我們將會向您的帳號收取 {renewalPrice}。您可以在帳號設定頁面管理訂閱與自動更新選項。若您未滿 18 歲，請在購買之前徵求家長或法定監護人的同意。若您在未經同意下進行購買，您的帳號可能會遭刪除。

english: Buy Robux to purchase upgrades for your avatar or special abilities in experiences.{lineBreak} Subscribe to Roblox Premium and get even more Robux each month, as well as bonus features. Premium is billed every month until cancelled. {learnMoreLinkStart}Learn more here.{learnMoreLinkEnd}
translation: Robux 可以用來購買虛擬人偶強化或體驗內的特殊能力。{lineBreak}訂閱 Roblox Premium 可以每一個月獲得更多 Robux，並使用額外功能。Roblox Premium 採月費制，直到取消為止。{learnMoreLinkStart}前往此處了解更多{learnMoreLinkEnd}。

description: Part 1 of a two part label (Label.SinceYouSubscribed)
Part 2 of a 2 part label
translation: 您會獲得 10% 額外 Robux
以 9 折優惠價購買 Robux

english: As a Premium user, you get discounts on Robux!
translation: 您為 Premium 使用者，購買 Robux 時可享有折扣！

english: If you are under 18 make sure you have the permission of your parent or legal guardian before making a purchase. Making a purchase without permission may result in your account being deleted.  By clicking “Submit Order” (1) you authorize us to charge your account every month until you cancel the subscription, and (2) you represent that you understand and agree to the {termsLinkStart}Terms of Use{termsLinkEnd} and {privacyLinkStart}Privacy Policy{privatyLinkEnd}. You can cancel at any time by clicking “Cancel membership” on the {billingLinkStart}billing tab{billingLinkEnd}  of the setting page. If you cancel, you will still be charged for the current billing period.
translation: 若您未滿 18 歲，請在購買之前徵求家長或法定監護人的同意。若您在未經同意下進行購買，您的帳號可能會遭刪除。按下「提交訂單」即表示 (1) 您授權我們每個月向您的帳號扣款，直到你取消訂閱為止；(2) 您了解並同意{termsLinkStart}使用條款{termsLinkEnd}與{privacyLinkStart}隱私權政策{privatyLinkEnd}。您隨時可以前往設定頁面裡的 {billingLinkStart}帳務標籤{billingLinkEnd}使用按鈕取消您的會員資格。若您取消，您依然需要為目前的帳單週期付費。

english: When you buy Robux, you receive only a limited, non-refundable, non-transferable, revocable license to use Robux, which have no value in real currency. See {termsLinkStart}Terms of Use{termsLinkEnd} for other limitations.  If you're under 18 make sure you have the permission of your parent or legal guardian before making a purchase. Making a purchase without permission may result in your account being deleted.
translation: 您購買 Robux 時只會獲得使用 Robux 的授權。該授權具有限制性、無法退款、無法轉讓、可被收回，並且沒有金錢價值。若要了解其他限制，請前往{termsLinkStart}使用條款{termsLinkEnd}。若您未滿 18 歲，請在購買之前徵求家長或法定監護人的同意。若您在未經同意下進行購買，您的帳號可能會遭刪除。

english: When you buy Robux you receive only a limited, non-refundable, non-transferable, revocable license to use Robux, which has no value in real currency. By selecting the Premium subscription package, (1) you agree that you are over 18 and that you authorize us to charge your account every month until you cancel the subscription, and (2) you represent that you understand and agree to the Terms of Use, which includes an agreement to arbitrate any dispute between you and Roblox, and {privacyLinkStart}Privacy Policy{privacyLinkEnd}. You can cancel at any time by clicking “Cancel subscription” on the {billingLinkStart}billing tab{billingLinkEnd} of the setting page. If you cancel, you will still be charged for the current billing period. See {termsLinkStart}Terms of Use{termsLinkEnd} for other limitations.
translation: 您購買 Robux 時只會獲得使用 Robux 的授權。該授權具有限制性、無法退款、無法轉讓、可被收回，並且沒有金錢價值。您選擇 Premium 訂閱即代表 (1) 您年滿 18 歲，允許我們在您取消訂閱之前每個月向您的帳號收費，及 (2) 您了解並同意使用條款（其中包括透過調解處理您與 Roblox 的爭議的協議）和{privacyLinkStart}隱私權政策{privacyLinkEnd}。您隨時可以前往設定頁面裡的{billingLinkStart}帳務標籤{billingLinkEnd}使用「取消訂閱」按鈕取消您的會員資格。若您取消，您依然需要為目前的帳單週期付費。若要獲得其他限制相關的資訊，請查看{termsLinkStart}使用條款{termsLinkEnd}。

english: Only adults are allowed to make purchases on Roblox.  I agree that I am at least 18 years of age. I am the owner of this account or the parent or legal guardian of the owner. I authorize this purchase and I agree to the Terms of Use.

translation: 我確定我是帳號主人的家長或法定監護人。我批准此項購買，並同意服務條款。

english: You've spent a lot on Roblox this month. Do you want to proceed?{linebreak}This purchase involves the exchange of real money. You must be the parent or legal guardian of the account owner to authorize this purchase.

english: You've spent a lot on Roblox this month.{linebreak}Receipts will be sent to the verified parental email on this account for this and all subsequent purchases.
translation: 您本月已在 Roblox 消費大量金錢。{linebreak}此筆購買和日後購賣的收據將會傳送到此帳號經驗證的家長電子郵件地址。

english: Sorry, your transaction cannot be completed as you have reached a purchasing limit. Please try your transaction again in 24-72 hours. If unsuccessful, you may need to wait until next month to make a new purchase. Purchasing limits cannot be changed or removed.
translation: 對不起，您已到達購買上限，無法完成交易。請在 24 到 72 小時候重新嘗試交易。若仍然無法完成交易，您最久可能要到隔月才可以進行新的購買。購買上限無法變更或移除。

english: By purchasing Robux, you agree to our {termsLinkStart}Terms of Use{termsLinkEnd} including the arbitration clause and to our {privacyLinkStart}Privacy Policy{privacyLinkEnd}.
translation: 購買 Robux 即表示您同意{termsLinkStart}使用條款{termsLinkEnd}（包括仲裁條款）和{privacyLinkStart}隱私權政策{privacyLinkEnd}。

english: By clicking {button} you acknowledge that you are 18 years of age, or that you are the parent or legal guardian of the account owner, and that you agree to our {termsLinkStart}Terms of Use{termsLinkEnd} including the arbitration clause and to our {privacyLinkStart}Privacy Policy{privacyLinkEnd}. You will be charged {robuxAmount} monthly. Cancel anytime by contacting your app store - more information {cancelMembershipInfoLinkStart}here{cancelMembershipInfoLinkEnd}. No partial refunds.
translation: 按下 {button} 即表示您已滿 18 歲或是帳號主人的家長或法定監護人，並同意{termsLinkStart}使用條款{termsLinkEnd}（包括仲裁條款）和{privacyLinkStart}隱私權政策{privacyLinkEnd}。您每個月將會被收取 {robuxAmount}。您可以隨時聯絡 App Store 取消訂閱，請前往{cancelMembershipInfoLinkStart}此處{cancelMembershipInfoLinkEnd}了解詳情。我們不受理部分退款。

description: This is a duplicated message. Please uncheck this one when doing export.

english: Please allow up to 5 minutes for the upgrades or changes you have purchased to be applied to your account. We hope you find your time at Roblox to be both safe and fun. If there is ever anything we can do to make your experience even better, please let us know.
translation: 您購買的產品將在 5 分鐘內套用到您的帳號。希望您在 Roblox 可以享受安全又愉快的時光。如果您有讓我們可以加強您的遊戲體驗的建議，歡迎您聯絡我們。

translation: 您已成功購買本月的 Premium 會員資格。{lineBreak}如您還需要協助，請聯絡{linkStart}客服人員{linkEnd}。
