translation: {linkStart}按下此處{linkEnd}兌換 Roblox 存額或查看其他付款方式。

english: Your purchase is being processed. We are waiting for confirmation from our 3rd party payment provider. This can take a few days. Please check your email inbox and find the barcode to complete this transaction. For questions regarding your payment processing status, please contact {linkStart}Xsolla{linkEnd}. {lineBreak}{lineBreak} We hope you find your time at Roblox to be both safe and fun. If there is ever anything we can do to make your experience even better, please let us know.
translation: 我們正在等待第三方付款服務商家的確認，您的購買可能需要幾天才能完成。請在您的電子郵件帳號裡尋找條碼，方可完成此交易。若有付款處理狀態的問題，請聯絡 {linkStart}Xsolla{linkEnd}。{lineBreak}{lineBreak}希望您在 Roblox 可以享受安全又愉快的時光。如果您有讓我們可以加強您的遊戲體驗的建議，歡迎您聯絡我們。

description: Secure Payment

english: Sorry, your transaction cannot be completed as you have reached a purchasing limit. Please try your transaction again in 24-72 hours. If unsuccessful, you may need to wait up to 30 days to make a new purchase. Purchasing limits cannot be changed or removed.
translation: 對不起，您已到達購買上限，無法完成交易。請在 24 到 72 小時候重新嘗試交易。若仍然無法完成交易，您最長可能要到 30 天候才可以進行新的購買。購買上限無法變更或移除。

english: ERROR: PayPal transaction has been declined.
translation: 錯誤：PayPal 交易遭到拒絕。

english: ERROR: Transaction was declined by payment provider.
translation: 錯誤：交易遭到付款服務商家拒絕。

english: Duplicate transaction detected from the payment provider. Purchase did not go through. Please try again in a few minutes. Do not refresh the payment web page.
translation: 偵測到來自付款服務商家的重複交易，購買未完成。請幾分鐘後重新嘗試，請勿重新整理付款頁面。

english: ERROR: PayPal transaction has been blocked.
translation: 錯誤：PayPal 交易遭到阻擋。

translation: 發生意外錯誤，請幾分鐘後重新嘗試。

translation: 此卡號無效，請檢查卡號再重新嘗試。

english: This card number has too few digits. Please check number and try again.
translation: 此卡號數元不足，請檢查卡號再重新嘗試。

english: This card number has too many digits. Please check number and try again.
translation: 此卡號數元過多，請檢查卡號再重新嘗試。

translation: 處理付款時發生問題，請重新嘗試。

english: This security code is invalid. Please check number and try again.
translation: 此安全碼無效，請檢查安全碼再重新嘗試。

translation: 此安全碼數元不足，請檢查安全碼再重新嘗試。

english: You must be the parent or legal guardian of the account owner to make this purchase. Card owners may be contacted for confirmation.

english: Using a card without permission will result in the account being deleted.
translation: 若您未經許可使用金融卡，您的帳號將會遭到刪除。

english: Your transaction cannot be completed at this time, as you have reached a transaction limit. Please visit our {startLink}Help Center{endLink} for general information on purchasing. Please note Customer Support cannot change or remove these limits.
translation: 您已達到交易上限，目前無法完成您的交易。若要了解更多關於買賣的基本資訊，請前往{startLink}支援中心{endLink}。請注意，客服人員無法變更或解除交易上限。

english: Hello,{lineBreak}{lineBreak}We're reaching out to you to let you know that the following content has been removed from Roblox: {AudioUrlLink}. This content has been removed under Roblox’s intellectual property policies and you have received a refund for the cost of the audio upload.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Roblox respects the intellectual property rights of others and requires that all members of the Roblox community do the same. You should make sure you have the legal right (such as permission from the copyright owner) to upload content you haven’t created yourself. You should remove from your account, including within your experiences, content that belongs to others that you don’t have the legal right to use. If you're not sure whether you have the right to use that content, you should remove it.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Thank you,{lineBreak}- The Roblox Team

description: Displayed when we fail to load captcha javascript from a third party provider. This has been known to occur in FireFox when "block trackers" is enabled - we need to let the user know that it might be due to their browser without implying that we are intentionally forcing them to turn off their ad/content blockers.

description: email template (HTML) for PremiumExpiredMessage
english:
Dear {userName},

Your Roblox Premium subscription ended today

If you renew Roblox Premium , you will continue to receive benefits such as…

- Reciving your monthly Robux stipend

- Discounts when buying Robux

- Access to Premium benefits in experiences

- Access to the Trade System


Happy Gaming!

Thanks from - The Roblox Team
translation:
{userName} 您好，

您的 Roblox Premium 今天到期了

若您續訂 Roblox Premium ，您將會繼續獲得以下福利：

- 每月 Robux 津貼

- 以優惠價購買 Robux

- 使用體驗內 Premium 福利

- 使用交易系統


祝您遊戲愉快！

Roblox 團隊感謝您

translation: 您的 Premium 訂閱已過期

description: As in, "The program formerly known as Builder's Club is now called Premium."
english: Builders Club is now Roblox Premium
translation: Builders Club 成為 Roblox Premium 了

english:
Moving forward, subscribers will be granted a monthly lump sum of Robux instead of receiving it in daily increments. Today, we’re depositing {robuxAmount} Robux in your account to make up for the remaining amount you would have earned this month.

Check your Roblox Inbox for more details.
translation:
和以往每日發放 Robux 不同，訂閱者每個月將會獲得一整個月的 Robux 金額。我們今天會給您 {robuxAmount} Robux，補償您本月尚未獲得的金額。

若要了解更多，請前往您的 Roblox 收件箱。

english:
Premium now gives you a monthly allowance of Robux all at once, instead of a daily allowance! Today we’re giving you a one time payout of {robuxAmount}

Check your Roblox inbox to learn more about your Robux payout and Premium subscription.
translation:
和以往每日發放 Robux 不同，Premium 將會每月發放整個月的 Robux 給您！我們今天會發放給您本月的 Robux 金額，扣除您已經獲得的金額。您將獲得：{robuxAmount}。

若要了解ㄍ更多關於 Robux 發放和 Premium 訂閱的資訊，請前往收件匣。

translation: 此語言尚未支援體驗內字型。目前仍可新增翻譯，但翻譯不會在體驗內顯示。

english: In-Experience support is not yet available for this language.
translation: 此語言尚未支援體驗內字型。

english: Automatic translations will be disabled for this language. Existing translations will remain unchanged.
translation: 將為此語言停用自動翻譯。現有翻譯將會保留。

english: Automatic Translations have been enabled for {languageName}
Automatic Translations have been disabled for {languageName}

Roblox now includes automatic translation support for our developers! This service is provided in the form of two quotas: an initial and a monthly. Initial quota is meant to help you get started on localizing your entire experience. Over time, as you update your experience, monthly quota will renew to ensure a continuously localized experience.
translation: Roblox 現在已為開發者支援自動翻譯！自動翻譯分為兩個額度。初始額度可以用來為先為整個遊體驗行在地化。隨著體驗日後更新，您可以使用每個月更新的每月額度讓體驗持續在地化。

english: Automatic translations for universe name and description have been enabled for {languageName}.
translation: 已啟用世界名稱和說明的{languageName}自動翻譯。

english: Automatic translations for universe name and description have been disabled for {languageName}.
translation: 已停用世界名稱和說明的{languageName}自動翻譯。

english: Disable Automatic Translation for Universe Name & Description
translation: 停用世界名稱和說明的自動翻譯

english: Automatic translations will be disabled for Universe Name and Description for this language. Existing translations will remain unchanged.
translation: 將停用此語言的世界名稱和說明自動翻譯。現有翻譯將會保留。

english: Disabling Automatic Translation for Universe Information & Name failed. Please try again later.
translation: 無法停用世界資訊和名稱的自動翻譯，請稍後再試。

english: Loading Automatic Translation Universe Information & Name switch failed. Please try again later.
translation: 無法載入世界資訊和名稱的自動翻譯，請稍後再試。

english:
Going forward, you will receive a full month’s worth of Robux on the day of your subscription renewal. Today, we’re giving you this month's Robux minus what you’ve already received this month: {robuxAmount}.{newLine}{newLine}
Check your Roblox inbox for more details.
translation: 從現在開始，您會在訂閱更新當天獲得一整個月的 Robux 金額。我們今天會給您本月尚未獲得的 Robux 金額：{robuxAmount}。{newLine}{newLine}若需更多資訊，請前往收件箱。

english: Unlinking this account will log you out of Roblox. You will have to link your account again to log back in.
translation: 解除連接此帳號後，您將會登出 Roblox。若要重新登入，您就必須重新連接您的帳號。

english: Disconnect your connected accounts here. Unlinking an account will log you out of Roblox.
translation: 在此將已連接的帳號解除連接，您將在解除連接帳號後登出 Roblox。

english: We noticed you logged in with Facebook which is no longer supported. Please add a password so you don’t get locked out.

english: We are removing Facebook login soon. Please add a password below. Note that you will no longer be able to log in with Facebook once you complete this step.
translation: 我們即將停止支援 Facebook 登入，請在下方新增密碼。完成此步驟後，您將無法再使用 Facebook 登入。

english: You can now log in with your username and password.
translation: 您現在能以使用者和密碼登入。

english: Increase {startLink}Roblox Premium{endLink} visitors' engagement in your experience to earn payouts.
translation: {startLink}Roblox Premium{endLink} 訪客在您的體驗的時間越長，您賺取的 Robux 也越多。
歡迎來到 Premium 支付！

english: Premium Payouts rewards you for making awesome experiences on Roblox that Premium subscribers love. If a Premium subscriber is visiting your experiences, you’re earning a Premium payout, even if the user isn’t spending Robux in your experiences. These payouts are on top of what you earn from selling items in your experience. You can spend your payout on Roblox or you can convert it to cash if you meet the {devexLinkStart}DevEx requirements{devexLinkEnd}.
translation: 如果 Premium 訂閱者常常參訪您的體驗，您就可以透過 Premium 支付賺取 Robux！只要 Premium 訂閱者參訪您的體驗，不管他有沒有花 Robux，您一樣會獲得 Premium 支付金額。Premium 支付金額可以與您在體驗中販售道具的收入重疊。您獲得的 Robux 可以直接在 Roblox 裡使用，符合{devexLinkStart}DevEx 資格{devexLinkEnd}的創作者也可以將 Robux 轉換為現金。

english: To see how much you’ve earned from Premium Payouts, check your {sumLinkStart}Robux history{sumLinkEnd}.
translation: 若要查看您從 Premium 支付獲得的 Robux，請前往您的 {sumLinkStart}Robux 紀錄{sumLinkEnd}。

description: Not used
english: Premium Payouts are calculated per experience based on your Premium Engagement Score. The Premium Engagement Score shows how popular your experience is among Premium subscribers as compared to other experiences. So if Premium subscribers are visiting your experience more than any other experience, your Premium Payout will be higher! You can see what your Premium Engagement Score and Premium Payouts are in {devStatsLinkStart}Developer Statistics{devStatsLinkEnd}.
translation: Premium 支付金額會根據您每一個體驗的 Premium 互動分數而分開計算。Premium 互動分數會讓您知道您的體驗在 Premium 訂閱者間的人氣。如果 Premium 訂閱者在您的體驗的時間比在其他體驗的時間多，您也會獲得更高的 Premium 支付金額！您可以在{devStatsLinkStart}開發者數據{devStatsLinkEnd}中看到您的 Premium 互動分數和 Premium 支付金額。

english: To increase your Premium Payouts, you can encourage your visitors to buy Premium by building exclusive levels, items, and benefits for Premium subscribers and using the {modalLinkStart}Premium Upsell modal{modalLinkEnd} to allow them to purchase Premium in your experience.
translation: 若要增加您的 Premium 支付金額，您可以創作 Premium 訂閱者限定的等級、道具及福利，並且在體驗內對訪客{modalLinkStart}追加銷售 Premium{modalLinkEnd}。

english: To benefit from Premium Payouts, your experience must be free to access.
translation: 只有免費體驗才可以獲得 Premium 支付金額。
{moreInfoLinkStart}前往此處了解更多關於 Premium 支付的資訊{moreInfoLinkEnd}。

description: Not used
english: Premium Payouts are calculated per experience based on your Premium engagement score. The Premium engagement score shows how popular your experience is among Premium subscribers as compared to other experiences. So if Premium subscribers are visiting your experience more than any other experience, your Premium Payout will be higher! You can see what your Premium engagement score and Premium Payouts are in {devStatsLinkStart}Developer Statistics{devStatsLinkEnd}
translation: Premium 支付金額會根據您每一個體驗的 Premium 互動分數而分開計算。Premium 互動分數會讓您知道您的體驗在 Premium 訂閱者間的人氣。如果 Premium 訂閱者在您的體驗的時間比在其他體驗的時間多，您也會獲得更高的 Premium 支付金額！您可以在{devStatsLinkStart}開發者數據{devStatsLinkEnd}中看到您的 Premium 互動分數和 Premium 支付金額。

You can see what your Premium engagement score and Premium Payouts are in the {devStatsLinkStart}Premium Payouts chart{devStatsLinkEnd} in Developer Statistics.

english: Premium stats are all calculated per experience in Central Standard Time (CST).
translation: Premium 數據以中部標準時間（CST）在每一個體驗分開計算。

english: Please choose a password that is brand {startSpan}new{endSpan} and {startSpan}unique{endSpan} to Roblox, do not use this password on any other site. This is the best way to prevent your Roblox account from getting compromised.
translation: 請選擇{startSpan}全新{endSpan}且{startSpan}只用於 Roblox {endSpan}的密碼。請勿在其它網站上使用此密碼，以免您的 Roblox 帳號遭到入侵。

english: For the safety and security of your account, your Roblox password has been reset. To regain access to your account, please type in your email or phone number and click the submit button on this page. If you do not have an email or phone number associated with your account, please contact Roblox customer support at {aTagStartWithHref}{emailMailToLink}{hrefEnd}{emailText}{aTagEnd}.
translation: 為了維護帳號安全，您的 Roblox 密碼已被重置。若要取回您的帳號，請在此頁面輸入您的電子郵件地址或手機號碼，並按下「提交」。若您的帳號沒有電子郵件地址或手機號碼，請在 {aTagStartWithHref}{emailMailToLink}{hrefEnd}{emailText}{aTagEnd} 聯絡 Roblox 客服人員。

english: Have a "Support A Video Star" code?
translation: 您有「支持 Video Star」的 Star Code 嗎？

english: Enter a {StarCode} to support your favorite Video Star! They will earn 5% of your purchase and you will keep the Robux you paid for.
translation: 輸入 {StarCode}，支持您最愛的 Video Star！您支持的 Video Star 會獲得您的購買的 5%，您也會保留已支付的 Robux。

translation: 您可以使用此角色進入上百萬款遊戲！

description: Used for email subject and Roblox message subject.

description:
DEPRECATED.
Was used for email body and Roblox message body.
english: Hello {username},{linebreak}{linebreak}Congratulations! Your experience has received a Premium Payout of {robuxAmount} Robux.{linebreak}This payout is calculated every day and reflects how much time Premium subscribers spend playing your experience.{linebreak}This is a one-time notification only. To see future payouts, check out the Premium tab of your experience statistics or the Summary tab of your earnings.{linebreak}Click {htmlAHref}here{htmlCloseAHref} to learn more about Premium Payouts! {url}{linebreak}{linebreak}Happy building!{linebreak}- Roblox
translation: {username} 您好，{linebreak}{linebreak}恭喜您！您的體驗獲得了 {robuxAmount} Robux 的 Premium 支付。{linebreak}Premium 支付金額會每天計算，Premium 訂閱者參訪您的體驗越久，支付金額就會更高。{linebreak}您只會收到此通知一次。若要查看未來的支付，請前往體驗數據裡的 Premium 標籤或您的收入裡的概要標籤。{linebreak}若要了解更多關於 Premium 支付的資訊，請按下{htmlAHref}此處{htmlCloseAHref}。{url}{linebreak}{linebreak}祝您創作愉快！{linebreak}Roblox 團隊

description: Used for email body and Roblox message body.
english: Hello {username},{linebreak}{linebreak}Congratulations! Your experience {gameName} has received a Premium Payout of {robuxAmount} Robux.{linebreak}This payout is calculated every day and reflects how much time Premium subscribers spend playing your experience.{linebreak}To see future payouts, check out the {htmlAHrefStatsPage}Premium tab{htmlCloseAHref} of your experience statistics or the {htmlAHrefMoneySummaryPage}Summary tab{htmlCloseAHref} of your earnings.{linebreak}This is a one-time notification only. If you have other experiences, they may also be earning Robux from Premium Payouts, which will be reflected in their respective experience statistics.{linebreak}Click {htmlAHrefPremiumPage}here{htmlCloseAHref} to learn more about Premium Payouts! {urlPremiumPage}{linebreak}{linebreak}Happy building!{linebreak}- Roblox
translation: {username} 您好，{linebreak}{linebreak}恭喜您！您的體驗 {gameName} 獲得了 {robuxAmount} Robux 的 Premium 支付。{linebreak}Premium 支付金額會每天計算，Premium 訂閱者參訪您的體驗越久，支付金額就會更高。{linebreak}若要查看未來的支付，請前往體驗數據裡的 {htmlAHrefStatsPage}Premium 標籤{htmlCloseAHref}或您的收入裡的{htmlAHrefMoneySummaryPage}概要標籤{htmlCloseAHref}。{linebreak}您只會收到此通知一次。若您有其他體驗，您可以在個別的體驗數據裡看看它們有沒有獲得 Premium 支出 Robux。{linebreak}若要了解更多關於 Premium 支付的資訊，請按下{htmlAHrefPremiumPage}此處{htmlCloseAHref}。{urlPremiumPage}{linebreak}{linebreak}祝您創作愉快！{linebreak}Roblox 團隊

english: You purchased a subscription through Apple.
translation: 您透過 Apple 購買了訂閱。
您的訂閱會在 {renewDate} 續訂。

english: Please follow these instructions to {linkStart}manage your Apple subscription{linkEnd}.
translation: 請依照以下步驟{linkStart}管理您的 Apple 訂閱{linkEnd}。

english: You purchased a subscription through Google Play.
translation: 您透過 Google Play 購買了訂閱。

english: Please follow these instructions to {linkStart}manage your Google subscription{linkEnd}.
translation: 請依照以下步驟{linkStart}管理您的 Google 訂閱{linkEnd}。

english: You must wait {promotionTermNum} days from the time of purchase before canceling your promotional Roblox Premium Builders Club membership. You can then cancel the membership at any time after {promotionTermNum} days. You must cancel before the next renewal date to stop a recurring charge. You will still receive the full time you have previously paid for.
translation: 您只能在購買 {promotionTermNum} 天後取消您的促銷 Roblox Premium Builders Club 會員資格。過了 {promotionTermNum} 天以後，您就可以隨時取消。若要停止定期收費，您必須在續訂日期取消會員資格。您先前付費所獲得的天數不會受到影響。

english: Your Roblox Premium membership cannot be canceled at this time as it is currently in the process of renewal with our payment processor, which briefly disallows changes to the membership during this time. Once the renewal process is complete, the membership can be canceled and you will still receive the full amount of time paid for. For further information, please contact {linkStart}Customer Service{linkEnd}. Please note, Customer Service is unable to cancel a membership until the renewal process is complete.
translation: 您的 Roblox Premium 會員資格目前正在透過付款服務續訂，目前無法取消。您在付款服務處理會員資格時無法做出任何變更。您可以在續訂過程完成後取消會員資格，並保留您付費所獲得的天數。若要取得更多資訊，請聯絡{linkStart}客服人員{linkEnd}。請注意，客服人員無法在續訂過程完成之前取消會員資格。

english: You purchased a subscription on your computer.
translation: 您在電腦上購買了訂閱。

english: You are not subscribed to any recurring billing products.
translation: 您目前沒有訂閱任何付費產品。

english: You are about to cancel your monthly Roblox Premium membership renewal. Your existing membership will continue until {expirationDate}.
translation: 您即將取消您的 Roblox Premium 會員資格續訂。您目前的會員資格將會持續到 {expirationDate}。

english: If you cancel your monthly Roblox Premium membership, you will lose these benefits:
translation: 若您取消您每月的 Roblox Premium 會員資格，您將會失去這些福利：

description: Description explaining subscription will grant a certain amount of robux on a specific frequency

english: Sell your creations to others in the Roblox Catalog.
translation: 在 Roblox 型錄向其他玩家販賣您的創作。

english: You have earned {earnings} from item sales.
Never see any outside ads on Roblox.com.
translation: 不在 Roblox.com 看到外部廣告。

english: Are you sure you want to cancel?
You have canceled your recurring membership.
translation: 您已取消了會員資格訂閱。

english: We hope you will continue to find your time at Roblox both safe and fun. If there is ever anything we can do to make your experience even better, please let us know. You can send us a message at {linkStart}customer support{linkEnd}.
translation: 我們希望您還會繼續在 Roblox 享受安全和愉快的時光。如果您有讓我們可以加強您的遊戲體驗的建議，歡迎您{linkStart}聯絡我們的客服人員{linkEnd}。

english: Canceling will end your subscription on {date}. Starting on that date, you will lose all Premium benefits:
translation: 取消訂閱後，訂閱會在 {date} 到期，您在當天就會失去所有 Premium 福利：

english: - Robux deposited into your account once per month
translation: - 帳號每個月獲得一次 Robux

english: - 10% more when you {aStartTag}purchase Robux{aEndTag} in the future
translation: - {aStartTag}購買 Robux{aEndTag} 時額外獲得 10% Robux
- 使用{aStartTag}體驗{aEndTag}內 Premium 福利

english: - Exclusive items and discounts in the {aStartTag}Avatar Shop{aEndTag}
translation: - 在{aStartTag}虛擬人偶商店{aEndTag}裡享有獨家道具與折扣

english: I had trouble finding Premium benefits
translation: 我找不到哪裡使用 Premium 福利

english: I want to switch to a different subscription tier
translation: 我想變更我的 Premium 方案

english: I don't want to play Roblox anymore
Using Premium benefits wasn't valuable to me
translation: Premium 福利對我來說不值我花的錢

english: I didn't understand the benefits of Roblox Premium
translation: 我不太了解 Premium 福利

english: I just wanted to make a one-time Robux purchase
What made you cancel Roblox Premium? (Select all that apply)
translation: 您為什麼選擇取消 Roblox Premium？（請選擇所有適用項目）
兌換 Roblox 促銷序號

english: How do I get a Roblox promotional code?
translation: 我要如何取得 Roblox 促銷序號？

english: You may receive a Roblox promo code from one of our many events or giveaways. Valid codes will earn you a virtual good that will be added to your Roblox account.
translation: 您可以在 Roblox 活動或大放送獲得促銷序號。兌換有效的促銷序號後，您的 Roblox 帳號將會收到一個虛擬商品。

english: How do I use my promotional code?
translation: 我要如何使用 Roblox 促銷序號？

english: This is the place to claim your goods. Enter the promo code in the section to the right and your free virtual good will be automatically added to your Roblox account. Remember that promo codes may expire or only be active for a short period of time, so make sure to use your code right away.
translation: 您可以在這裡領取商品。在右方輸入促銷序號後，免費的虛擬商品將會自動加到您的 Roblox 帳號。促銷序號有可能有限定的兌換期間，也有可能會過期，拿到促銷序號之後請盡快兌換。

english: An unexpected error occurred. Please try your request again later.
translation: 發生意外錯誤，請稍後再進行請求。

english: This card has already been redeemed.
We currently do not support the merchant you purchased this card from, please contact Customer Service.
translation: 我們目前不支援販賣此點數卡的商家，請聯絡客服人員。

english: The payment gateway is down. Please try the transaction again later and contact Customer Service if the problem persists.
translation: 目前無法使用付款平台，請稍後再試。若問題持續，請聯絡客服人員。

english: An unexpected error occured. Please try your request again later.
translation: 發生意外錯誤，請稍後再試。

english: You are buying a recurring {productName} product with Roblox credit. Your credit balance will be charged every renewal period.
translation: 您將以 Roblox 存額購買週期制的 {productName}。我們將會在每一個續約週期向您的存額收費。

english: Redeem cards in the section below.
Your PIN is on your receipt
translation: 您的 PIN 碼在您的收據上

english: Select one or more devices you would like to sponsor your experience on. Your experience will appear on the Discover page and in search results.
translation: 選擇您想在哪些裝置贊助您的體驗。您的遊戲會在探索頁面和搜尋結果裡出現。

english: This feature has been disabled for mobile
translation: 此功能未在行動裝置啟用

english: This feature has been disabled for tablets
This feature has been disabled for computer
This feature has been disabled for console
translation: 此功能未在遊戲機啟用

description: Click Through Rate
total impressions
Total Click Through Rate

translation: 注意：所有廣告皆會執行 24 小時。

english: You haven't sponsored any experiences yet.
Sorry, something has gone wrong. Please try again later.
translation: 對不起，發生錯誤。請稍後再試。

english: You do not have permission to stop this sponsorship.
translation: 您的權限不足，無法停止此贊助。

english: The feature has been disabled for this device.
translation: 此功能未在此裝置啟用。

english: Are you sure you want to stop sponsoring your experience? Your Robux will not be refunded.
translation: 確定停止贊助體驗？您將無法獲得 Robux 退款。

english: Your bid must be at least {miniumBid}.
This experience is not approved. Please fix any issues and try again.
translation: 此體驗未經核准，請將問題處理後再重新嘗試。

english: You do not have permission to sponsor this experience.
translation: 您沒有贊助此體驗的權限。

english: The sponsored experience code is invalid
The user ads service is currently unavailable.
translation: 使用者廣告服務目前無法使用。

translation: 在手機上贊助您的體驗
在平板上贊助您的體驗
在電腦上贊助您的體驗
在遊戲機上贊助您的體驗

english: This estimator uses data from sponsored ads run yesterday to guess how many impressions your sponsored ad will receive.
translation: 我們利用了昨天贊助廣告的數據來預計您的贊助廣告的曝光數。

english: The bid is lower than minimum bid.
Choose the experience you will advertise.
Your ad will always show the current version of your icon.
translation: 您的廣告將會固定顯示目前版本的圖示。

english: Choose who can see your ad.
At least one from each targeting type must be selected.
translation: 必須在每一個對象類型裡至少選擇一個選項。

english: Choose the duration of your ad.
Currently you can only start an ad today, and it can run for a max of {days} days.
translation: 您目前只能在今天啟用廣告，廣告最多可以活躍 {days} 天。

english: How many Robux do you want to spend per day?
The higher your daily budget, the more impressions your ad is likely to get.
translation: 每日預算越高，廣告就會更有可能獲得更高的曝光數。

english: Choose a descriptive name for your ad.
translation: 選擇一個可以描述您的廣告的名稱。

english: Robux will be immediately held in escrow upon submitting the ad. Unspent Robux will be returned when the ad is completed.
translation: 送出廣告後，您的 Robux 將會立刻交由第三方託管。未使用的 Robux 將會在廣告時段結束後歸還。

english: This ad name is only visible to you.
translation: 只有您可以看到廣告名稱。

english: Similar ads have budgeted the following per day (on average):
translation: 相似廣告的每日平均預算：

english: Changing experiences will reset all options to their defaults.
translation: 若切換體驗，所有選項將會還原到預設選項。

english: Daily budget multiplied by the number of days in your schedule
translation: 每日預算乘以時段天數

english: Based on ads that have run in the past with similar targeting
translation: 根據之前完成過目標相似的廣告

english: Daily budget is lower than minimum allowed.
Total budget must be greater than 0.
Start date must not be a future date.
translation: 開始日期無法設為未來日期。

english: End date must be a future date.
translation: 結束日期必須設為未來日期。

english: Start date must be earlier than end date.
translation: 開始熱其必須設在結束日期之前。

english: Total budget does not match daily spend and number of days being scheduled.
translation: 總預算與每日花費和時段天數不符。

english: Cannot load the universe for the specified universe id.
translation: 無法載入指定世界 ID 的世界。
廣告組合 ID 無效。
廣告名稱不可超過 255 個字元。

english: Daily budget is higher than maximum allowed.
Choose which {creatorName} experience you will advertise.
translation: 從 {creatorName} 的體驗中選擇要宣傳的體驗。

english: Your experience is not eligible for advertising.
translation: 您的體驗沒有刊登廣告的資格。

english: Your experience is currently not eligible for advertising. If you are attempting to advertise a new experience, please note it may take up to five days for your experience to clear quality checks.
translation: 您的體驗目前不符合宣傳資格。若您在嘗試宣傳新的體驗，您必須等待最多 5 天的品質審核過程完成。

description: game installation is not supported current platform
english: Your current platform is not supported
translation: Roblox 無法在您目前的平台上安裝

description: game installation requires Mac OS X 10.6 and up version
english: Roblox supports Mac OS X 10.6 and up
translation: Roblox 的最低作業系統需求為 Mac OS X 10.6

description: game installation support platforms
english: Roblox Requires at least Microsoft Windows 7 or Mac OS X 10.6
translation: Roblox 的最低作業系統需求為 Microsoft Windows 7 或 Mac OS X 10.6。

english: We’ve detected that you’re running a Mac operating system older than OS X 10.6, and therefore cannot play and build games using Roblox. We recommend you upgrade your operating system to at least Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard to get back into the action.
translation: 我們偵測到您在使用 Mac OS X 10.6 之前的作業系統，因此您無法在 Roblox 玩遊戲和創作遊戲。若您想繼續使用 Roblox，請將作業系統升級到 Mac OX 10.6 Snow Leopard 或更新的作業系統。

english: You can also play Roblox on any computer running Windows XP and up.
translation: 您也可以在運行 Windows XP 或更新作業系統的電腦玩 Roblox。

description: back to home page

english: To visit Roblox, sign into Roblox.com on a computer running at least Microsoft Windows 7 or Mac OS X 10.6 (or newer).
translation: 若要使用 Roblox，請在Roblox.com登入。Roblox 的最低作業系統需求為 Microsoft Windows 7 或 Mac OS X 10.6。

english: You are on a Windows device. Roblox Requires at least Microsoft Windows 7 or Mac OS X 10.6.
translation: 您在使用 Windows 裝置。Roblox 的最低作業系統需求為 Microsoft Windows 7 或 Mac OS X 10.6。

english: You are on a Mac device. Roblox Requires at least Microsoft Windows 7 or Mac OS X 10.6.
translation: 您在使用 Mac 裝置。Roblox 的最低作業系統需求為 Microsoft Windows 7 或 Mac OS X 10.6。

english: On Roblox, users can bid an amount of robux to buy advertising for their places, groups, clothing, and models.
translation: 使用者可以在 Roblox 上標價購買地點、群組、服裝和模型的廣告。

english: Download, edit and upload one of the following templates:
translation: 下載、編輯並上傳以下其中一個範本：

english: For tips and tricks, read the tutorial:
translation: 若需協助或想了解更多技巧，請閱讀教學：

english: How to Design an Effective Ad
Users will see this text when they mouse-over your ad.
translation: 使用者將鼠標放在廣告上時將會看到此文字。

description: Button text for uploading your advertisement

english: The ad needs to be approved by a Moderator before it can be launched from your Ad page.
translation: 廣告必須經過管理員審核後才可以從您的廣告頁面啟用。

description: Button text for downloading an ad template
what item the ad is for
Part of a key/value list for what the ad is for

english: The upload request was blocked. Try disabling any adblockers you have enabled.
translation: 上傳請求被阻擋，請確認廣告攔截器已停用。

description: Name of the studio section in the landing page
Name of the resources section (devhub, devforum, eduhub) in the landing page
The heading of the studio section
translation: 使用我們的免費沉浸式創作引擎，

description: The description of the studio section
english: With our FREE and immersive creation engine.

description: Text of the studio download button

english: Learn how to create engaging experiences through our wide set of tutorials and API reference materials.
translation: 透過我們眾多的教學和 API 參考資料，學習如何創作吸引人的體驗。

english: Talk with other developers, discuss platform updates, and recruit fellow collaborators.
translation: 與其他開發人員交流、討論平台更新和為您的團隊徵招新成員。

translation: 您送出 DevEx 請求的時間為 {submissionDate}

english: If your request is approved, and if this is your first time cashing out, you will receive an email inviting you to create an account on our DevEx portal. You will be prompted to enter your information at account creation. Please make sure your information is entered accurately into the DevEx portal, and is kept up to date at all times. The information you provide is used to ensure all payments comply with laws and regulations. Inaccuracies in information provided could impact your payment.
translation: 若您是第一次兌現，您將會在請求被批准後收到一封邀請您在 DevEx 平台建立帳號的電子郵件。您在建立帳號時將會被要求輸入資訊。請確認您在 DevEx 平台上輸入的資訊是正確和最新的。您提供的資訊將會用來確保所有付款都將符合當地法規。若提供的資料有誤，付款將可能會受到影響。
更多 DevEx 相關資訊

english: Please complete this form to begin processing your payment. The email address you provide must match the email address on your DevEx Portal account
translation: 請完成此表格開始付款程序。您提供電子郵件的地址必須與您的 DevEx 平台帳號的電子郵件地址符合。

english: You can create ads by clicking “Create Sponsored Ad” button.
translation: 您可以按下「建立贊助廣告」按鈕建立廣告。

english: How many people have played your experience after clicking on your ad
translation: 點擊您的廣告後參訪體驗的人數

english: How many people have played your experience after seeing your ad
translation: 看到您的廣告後參訪體驗的人數

english: You have been visiting for {hours} hour(s).
translation: 您的使用時間已達 {hours} 小時。

english: Engagement score and payout based on engagement of monetized users.
translation: 互動分數與支付依據付費使用者的互動。

english: Premium playtime score is calculated daily based off the amount of time Roblox Premium subscribers spend playing your game.
translation: Premium 遊戲時間分數將每天根據 Roblox Premium 玩家在您的遊戲所花的時間計算。

english: Premium playtime Robux earned depends on your Premium playtime score, and is calculated over a 28-day window.
translation: 您賺取的 Premium 遊戲時間 Robux 將根據您的 Premium 遊戲時間分數決定，並以每 28 天的數據為一個週期計算。
賺取的 Premium 遊戲時間 Robux

english: We're currently experiencing delays. Please check again later.
translation: 系統目前發生延遲，請稍後再來查看。

english: The selected date range includes periods ineligible for Premium Payouts.
translation: 選擇的日期範圍含有不符合 Premium 支付資格的日期。
歡迎來到 Premium 支付！

english: Premium Payouts rewards you for making awesome games on Roblox that Premium subscribers love. If a Premium subscriber is playing your games, you’re earning a Premium payout, even if the user isn’t spending Robux in your games. These payouts are on top of what you earn from selling items in game. You can spend your payout on Roblox or you can convert it to cash if you meet the {devexLinkStart}DevEx requirements{devexLinkEnd}.
translation: 如果您的遊戲常常有 Premium 會員來玩，您就可以透過 Premium 支付賺取 Robux！只要 Premium 會員在您的遊戲裡，不管他有沒有花 Robux，您一樣會獲得 Premium 支付金額。Premium 支付金額可以與您在遊戲中販賣道具的收入重疊。您獲得的 Robux 可以直接在 Roblox 裡使用，符合 {devexLinkStart}DevEx 資格{devexLinkEnd}的創作者也可以將 Robux 轉換為現金。

english: To see how much you’ve earned from Premium Payouts, check your {sumLinkStart}Robux history{sumLinkEnd}.
translation: 若要查看您從 Premium 支付獲得的 Robux，請前往您的 {sumLinkStart}Robux 紀錄{sumLinkEnd}。

english: To increase your Premium Payouts, you can encourage your players to buy Premium by building exclusive levels, items, and benefits for Premium subscribers and using the {modalLinkStart}Premium Upsell modal{modalLinkEnd} to allow them to purchase Premium in your game.
translation: 若要增加您的 Premium 支付金額，您可以創作 Premium 玩家限定的等級、道具及福利，並且在遊戲內對玩家{modalLinkStart}追加銷售 Premium{modalLinkEnd}。

english: To benefit from Premium Payouts, your game must be a free game.
translation: 只有免費遊戲才可以獲得 Premium 支付金額。
{moreInfoLinkStart}前往此處了解更多關於 Premium 支付的資訊{moreInfoLinkEnd}。

english: See how many universe visits are from Premium subscribers.
translation: 看看來自 Premium 訂閱者的世界造訪次數有多少。

english: Premium visits are measured every hour by how many visits are ended by a Premium subscriber.
translation: Premium 造訪次數會每個小時統計 Premium 訂閱者造訪您的遊戲的次數。

english: Premium visit percentage shows you what proportion of your total visits are from Premium subscribers.
translation: Premium 造訪比例會告訴您 Premium 訂閱者佔您的總造訪次數的比例。

english: Increasing Premium visits helps increase your engagement score, which increases your Premium Payout.
translation: 高的 Premium 造訪次數有助於提高互動分數，Premium 支付金額也會更多。

english: Increase {startLink}Roblox Premium{endLink} players' playtime in your game to earn payouts. {learnLinkStart}Learn more{learnLinkEnd}.
translation: 只要 {startLink}Roblox Premium{endLink} 玩家花更多時間玩您的遊戲，您就可以獲得支付金額。前往{learnLinkStart}此處{learnLinkEnd}了解更多。

english: See how often the Premium prompt is shown in your game and how often a player buys Premium from it.
translation: 看看 Premium 視窗在您的遊戲顯示的頻率和玩家透過視窗購買 Premium 的頻率。

english: Conversions are how many times a player buys Premium from your Premium upsell.
translation: 轉換數為玩家透過 Premium 追加銷售訊息購買 Premium 的次數。

english: Increasing your conversion helps increase your engagement score, which increases your Premium Payout.
translation: 高的轉換數有助於提高互動分數，Premium 支付金額也會更多。

english: Conversion rate is calculated as the proportion of conversions to impressions (# of conversions / # of impressions).
translation: 轉換率為轉換數與曝光數的比率（轉換數 / 曝光數）。

english: Impressions are how many times your Premium upsell is shown.
translation: 曝光數為 Premium 追加銷售訊息顯示的次數。

english: Premium Payouts are calculated per game based on your Premium playtime score. The Premium playtime score shows how popular your game is among Premium subscribers as compared to other games. So if Premium subscribers are playing your game more than any other game, your Premium Payout will be higher! You can see what your Premium playtime score and Premium Payouts are in the {devStatsLinkStart}Premium Payouts chart{devStatsLinkEnd} in Developer Statistics.
translation: Premium 支付金額會根據您每一個遊戲的 Premium 遊戲時間分數而分開計算。Premium 遊戲時間分數會讓您知道您的遊戲在 Premium 會員間的人氣。如果 Premium 會員在您的遊戲的時間比在其他遊戲的時間多，您也會獲得更多 Premium 支付金額！您可以在開發者數據中的{devStatsLinkStart}Premium 支付圖表{devStatsLinkEnd}看到您的 Premium 遊戲時間分數和 Premium 支付金額。

english: You don't qualify for Premium Payouts because you have a paid access game
translation: 您擁有付費遊戲，不符合 Premium 支付資格
{divOneStart}已賺取 Robux：{robuxAmount}{divOneEnd}{divTwoStart}（根據 {start} 到 {end} 的 Premium 遊戲時間）{divTwoEnd}

english: {divOneStart}Projected Robux earned: {robuxAmount}{divOneEnd}{divTwoStart}(Based on {start}-{end} Premium playtime window){divTwoEnd}
translation: {divOneStart}預計賺取 Robux：{robuxAmount}{divOneEnd}{divTwoStart}（根據 {start} 到 {end} 的 Premium 遊戲時間）{divTwoEnd}

english: Premium stats are all calculated per game in Central Standard Time (CST).
translation: Premium 數據以中部標準時間（CST）在每一個遊戲分開計算。

english: TO LOG IN, MAKE SURE YOU:
• Only enter codes that you requested
translation: • 只輸入您要求的驗證碼
• 絕對不要輸入其他使用者的驗證碼

description: Confirm code input

english: You are about to sign in to: %s
This new device will receive access to your account, Robux, and inventory.
translation: 此新裝置將獲得您的帳號、Robux 及道具欄的存取權限。

english: The Quick Log In code was not verified.
translation: 快速登入碼未經過驗證。

english: GO TO YOUR LOGGED IN DEVICE TO ENTER THIS CODE AND EXPLORE
translation: 在已登入的裝置輸入登入碼開始探索

english: On your logged in device, go to:
translation: 在已登入的裝置上前往：

english: Account Settings > Quick Log In to enter your code.
translation: 帳號設定 > 快速登入輸入登入碼。

english: CONFIRM LOGIN ON YOUR OTHER DEVICE
translation: 在另外一個裝置確認登入

english: The code you entered was invalid. Please make sure you entered it correctly.
translation: 輸入的驗證碼無效，請確認您的驗證碼正確。

english: You are about to sign in to: {deviceInfo}
We couldn't match your location to the device trying to log in. Please try again on the same network.
translation: 您的位置無法對應到用來登入的裝置，請使用相同的網路重新嘗試。

english: Display Name not appropriate for Roblox
translation: 顯示名稱含有不當內容
顯示名稱含有未支援的字元

english: Display Name might contain private information
translation: 顯示名稱可能含有私人資料
顯示名稱長度應在 3 到 20 個字元之間

english: Your WeChat/QQ voucher expired. Please try to login again.
translation: 您的微信或 QQ 證書已過期，請重新嘗試登入。

english: It looks like you already have a Luobu account. Please try to log in again.
translation: 您似乎已經有羅布樂思帳號了，請嘗試重新登入。

english: Please try to log in again
The number of players in your game, updated every 30 seconds.
translation: 在您的遊戲的玩家數量，每 30 秒更新一次
位玩家分布在 {num} 個伺服器中

english: Your game is not filtered out of any sorts.
translation: 您的遊戲未從任何排序方式過濾。

english: This displays what device your game is filtered on and their crash rates.
translation: 顯示過濾此遊戲的裝置和其崩潰率。

english: Note: Historical traffic data may not be available.
translation: 注意：過去流量資料可能無法存取。
單一造訪 Robux 收入

english: Amount of Robux that users have spent in your place (before Marketplace Fee is applied)
translation: 使用者在您的地點花費的 Robux（扣除商城費用之前）

english: The number of times your place has been played
translation: 玩家參訪您的地點的次數

english: Average amount of time that players stay in your place (in minutes)
translation: 玩家在您的地點停留的平均時間（分鐘）

english: The number of times your place has been played segmented by age. This does not include Xbox users.
translation: 玩家按年齡參訪您的地點的次數，不包括 Xbox 使用者。

english: Amount of Robux spent in your place (before Marketplace Fee is applied) segmented by age. This does not include Xbox users.
translation: 使用者按年齡在您的地點花費的 Robux（扣除商城費用之前），不包括 Xbox 使用者。

english: Visit, Average Visit Length, and Revenue stats are all per-place, while the player count shown in Live Stats is for the entire game {gameLink}.
translation: 造訪、平均造訪時間及收入數據皆依照個別地點計算，即時數據的玩家數則依照完整遊戲 {gameLink} 計算。

english: Visit, Average Visit Length, and Revenue stats are all per-place, while the player count shown in Live Stats is for the entire game {gameLinkStart}{gameLinkEnd}.
translation: 造訪、平均造訪時間及收入數據皆依照個別地點計算，即時數據的玩家數則依照完整遊戲 {gameLinkStart}{gameLinkEnd} 計算。
無法載入遊戲詳細資料。
{numPlayers} 位玩家分布在 {numServers} 個伺服器中

english: Generate and download .CSV files of your game's sales data. Each file contains a month's worth of data broken down by the item sold and the place it was sold in. Includes data on sales of game passes, developer products, gear, and more! You can open the .CSV file in your favorite charting program and make some awesome graphs of how your developer product sales have improved over the last 6 months. See the wiki for more information on how to use .CSV files. Get started by selecting a month below:
translation: 生成並下載遊戲買賣資料的 .CSV 檔案。每一個檔案含有該月賣出道具和賣出地點的資料。包含的資料還有遊戲證、開發者產品、裝備等買賣。您可以使用試算表程式開啟 .CSV 檔案，並自行製作 6 個月內開發者產品買賣相關的圖表。若要了解更多關於 .CSV 檔案使用方式的資訊，請前往維基頁面。請選擇下方任一月份開始：
下載月度遊戲數據資料

english: Generate and download Excel spreadsheets files of your game's popularity data. Each file contains a month's worth of data, including data on rankings, downloads in different areas, and evolution of your game's popularity! Includes graphs of progress and can be opened by Excel or Google Sheets. Get started by selecting a month below:
translation: 生成並下載遊戲人氣資料的 Excel 試算表檔案。每一個檔案含有一整個月的資料，包括排名、各區域下載量、人氣變動、進度表等等，可在 Excel 或 Google 試算表開啟。請選擇下方任一月份開始：

description: For select dropdown menu

english: Generating XLSXs can take a long time. Your request has been queued and will continue in the background. Check back later to download the XLSX.
translation: 生成 XLSX 檔案可能會花一段時間。您的請求已在清單中，並會在後台繼續執行。請稍後再回來下載 XLSX 檔案。

english: Generating CSVs can take a long time. Your request has been queued and will continue in the background. Check back later to download the CSV.
translation: 生成 CSV 檔案可能會花一段時間。您的請求已在清單中，並會在後台繼續執行。請稍後再回來下載 CSV 檔案。

english: No report found by this name
Your game may not have any transactions during this time period
translation: 您的遊戲在這段時間內可能沒有交易

english: No report found by this name

description: user favorite games
title of Statistics section in profile page
User Join Date
number of visits of user owned places

english: When you've blocked a user, neither of you can directly contact the other.
translation: 當您封鎖一位使用者時，你們將無法直接聯絡彼此。

english: Are you sure you want to block this user?
Are you sure you want to unblock this user?
translation: 確定解除封鎖此使用者？

english: Unable to block user. You may have blocked too many people.
translation: 無法封鎖該帳號，您封鎖的人可能過多。

description: Analytics

english: The total number of daily (DAU) active users over a period of time.
translation: 一段時間內每日活躍使用者（DAU）的總數。

english: The total number of monthly (MAU) active users over a period of time.
translation: 一段時間內每月活躍使用者（MAU）的總數。

english: Number of new players that are first time players in the history of your game.
translation: 遊戲推出以來第一次進入遊戲的新玩家數。

english: The number of paying users in a day (DAU) or month (MAU). This includes the same user playing your game in different sessions.
translation: 單日（DAU）或單月（MAU）的付費玩家數，包括多次玩您的遊戲的單一使用者。

english: Below are some top level metrics that can be used to help analyze game performance. Information here can be filtered by date range. Every new datapoint is added during a 24-hour period.
translation: 以下是一些可以協助分析遊戲效能的頂層指標。以下的資訊可以依照日期範圍篩選。每 24 小時將會新增一個資料點。

english: Below are some metrics related to acquiring new users and the number of active users you have for your game. Information here can be filtered by date range. Every new datapoint is added during a 24-hour period.
translation: 以下是一些與獲得新使用者和遊戲活躍使用者數相關的指標。以下的資訊可以依照日期範圍篩選。每 24 小時將會新增一個資料點。

english: The number of hours players stay in your game.
translation: 玩家停留在遊戲的小時數。

english: The number of total plays or visits you receive in a day (DAU) or month (MAU). This includes the same user playing your game in different sessions.
translation: 您單日（DAU）或單月（MAU）獲得的總參訪次數，包括多次玩您的遊戲的單一使用者。

english: Below are some metrics related to retention to help you understand how to gain new recurring users as well as continue to engage them. Information here can be filtered by date range. Every new datapoint is added during a 24-hour period.
translation: 以下是一些幫助您了解您獲得新使用者和持續與他們互動的能力的的保留率指標。以下的資訊可以依照日期範圍篩選。每 24 小時將會新增一個資料點。

english: Percent of new players that played the game again within 24 hours after their first session. Note that a new player is defined as a new individual that has played your game for the very first time.
translation: 所有新玩家中，離第一次進入遊戲 24 小時內再次進入遊戲的玩家的百分比。新玩家的定義為第一次進入您的遊戲的新使用者。

english: Percent of new and existing players that came back to your game at least once within a 24-hour window.
translation: 24 小時內至少回訪您的遊戲 1 次的新舊玩家百分比。

english: Percent of new players who came back and played your game within 7 days. Note that a new player is defined as a new person that has played for your game for the very first time. D7 is also inclusive of D1 players.
translation: 所有新玩家中，離上一次進入遊戲 7 天內再次進入遊戲的玩家的百分比。新玩家的定義為第一次進入您的遊戲的新使用者。包括 24 小時內再次進入遊戲的玩家。

english: Percent of players (both new and existing) who play your game everyday based on within 7 days
translation: 所有新舊玩家中，7 天以內每天進入您的遊戲的玩家的百分比。

english: Percent of new players who came back and played your game within 30 days. Note that a new player is defined as a new person that has played for your game for the very first time. D30 is also inclusive of D7 and D1 players.
translation: 所有新玩家中，上一次進入遊戲 30 天內再次進入遊戲的玩家的百分比。新玩家的定義為第一次進入您的遊戲的新使用者。包括 7 天內和 24 小時內再次進入遊戲的玩家。

english: Percent of new and existing players that came back to your game at least once within a 30-day window.
translation: 30 天內至少回訪您的遊戲 1 次的新舊玩家百分比。

english: Percent of new and existing players that came back to your game at least once within a 7-day window.
translation: 7 天內至少回訪您的遊戲 1 次的新舊玩家百分比。

english: Your game does not have data during this time period
translation: 您的遊戲在這段時間內沒有資料

english: User does not have permissions on this resource.
translation: 使用者沒有權限存取此資源。

english: Ratio of new users to returning users (as a proportion)
translation: 新玩家與舊玩家比（以比例表示）
新玩家平均成長率（百分比）

english: Average total play time per day

translation: 遊戲時間平均成長（百分比）

english: Most recent total number of D1 players per day
translation: 最新單日 1 天玩家總數

english: Most recent total number of D7 players per week
translation: 最新單週 7 天玩家總數

english: Most recent total number of D30 players per week
translation: 最新單月 30 天玩家總數

english: ***Note that all data points are updated at 08:00:00.000Z in UTC. This means that if you are in a time zone west of UTC, such as Pacific Time, there can be perceived delays for when data is updated for the next day. Likewise, if you are based in a time zone east of UTC, it may appear that data is being updated at an earlier time. This is because the date filter at the top adjusts to your local time zone but the data points shown below are all in UTC.
translation: *** 注意：所有資料點會在世界協調時間 08:00:00.000Z 更新。如果您所在的時區位於世界協調時區西方（例：太平洋時間），隔日的資料更新看起來會延後執行。同樣地，如果您所在的時區位於世界協調時區東方，隔日的資料更新看起來會提早執行。此情形地原因為上方的日期篩選會依您的時區調整，但以下資料點皆以世界協調時間為準。

description: it is suffix for DAU/MAU, like {number} players

english: Total number of sessions created per day.

description: Tooltip message that is displayed when a user hovers over an enabled KPI chart export button.
english: Export your data to a .CSV file

description: Tooltip message that is displayed when a user hovers over a disabled KPI chart export button.
english: Your game does not have data during this time period
translation: 您的遊戲在這段時間內沒有資料

description: Toast notification error message that is displayed when a user clicks a KPI chart export button but the API request fails.
Text for the "Activate Analytics" button on each game's Overview page.
Terms of Use agreement that appears when a user clicks the "Activate Analytics" button on a game's Overview page.
english: By clicking “Agree,” you are agreeing to allow the data of your users to be shared with external data services for the sole purpose of analytics. Your users’ data will only be used for calculating aggregated analytics for each experience.
translation: 按下「同意」即表示您同意將使用者資料作為數據分析用途分享給外部資料服務。使用者資料只會用來計算每一個體驗的整合數據。

description: Terms of Use agreement note that appears when a user clicks the "Activate Analytics" button on a game's Overview page.
english: Note: For group owned experiences, group editors will also have permissions to view analytics in your dashboards.
translation: 注意：若體驗為群組體驗，群組編輯者也會擁有在後台查看數據的權限。

description: Terms of Use agreement that appears when a user clicks the "Run custom queries on PlayFab" link on a game's Analytics Overview page.
english: By clicking “Agree,” you are agreeing to allow group editors to run queries for your experience. This will allow you to collaborate and create custom queries.
translation: 按下「同意」即表示您同意允許群組編輯者對體驗執行查詢，您們將可以合作並建立自訂查詢。

description: Terms of Use agreement note that appears when a user clicks the "Run custom queries on PlayFab" link on a game's Analytics Overview page.
english: Note: PlayFab is a third party service provider with their own terms and privacy policies. Roblox does not control your use of their services. In order to collaborate with your group editors, you will need to provide collaborators with admin access in PlayFab.
translation: 注意：PlayFab 是第三方服務供應商，它擁有自己的條款和隱私權政策。Roblox 無法管制您對該服務的使用。若要和群組編輯者合作，您必須授予合夥人 PlayFab 的管理員權限。

description: Text for the "Run custom queries on PlayFab" button on each game's Analytics Overview page.
translation: 使用 PlayFab 執行自訂查詢

description: Toast notification that is displayed when a user agrees to the PlayFab Analytics Terms of Use and the enrollment is successful.
english: Congrats! Your game has been registered in PlayFab. Game events will now be logged and your dashboards will begin to populate in 24-48 hours.
translation: 恭喜，您的遊戲已在 PlayFab 登記！遊戲內活動將會被記錄，您的後台也會在 24 到 48 小時候開始出現資料。

description: Toast notification that is displayed when a user agrees to the PlayFab Custom Queries Terms of Use.
english: You can now access your game in PlayFab and run custom queries. Check your inbox for a PlayFab account activation email.
translation: 您已可在 PlayFab 存取遊戲並執行自訂查詢，PlayFab 帳號啟用電子郵件已傳到您的收件箱。

english: Median Benchmark for Games in Tier Above
translation: 一個階級之上的遊戲的中位數指標

english: Updated quarterly, benchmarks allow you to compare your game’s performance to others with similar rankings so you can set reasonable goals to get to the next tier.
translation: 您可以使用每季更新一次的指標比較您的遊戲和其他階級相似的遊戲之間的表現，讓您可以訂定合理的目標前往下一個階級。

Users aged 18 and over
Android Operating System
OS (Apple) Operating System
OSX (Apple) Operating System
Windows operating system
iOS operating platform
For breakdown segments that don't belong in a specific category
Tablet devices like the iPad
Phone

english: Users may be double counted if they played with more than one device
translation: 使用多個裝置的使用者可能會被重複計算。

english: Action Requested: Secure Your Roblox Account
translation: 動作請求：保護您的 Roblox 帳號
保護您的 Roblox 帳號

english: {paragraphStart}We have detected unusual activity on your Roblox account: {emphasisStart}{username}{emphasisEnd}.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}For your security, we have locked your account. To access your account, please reset your password by clicking the button below.{paragraphEnd}
translation: {paragraphStart}我們在您的 Roblox 帳號 {emphasisStart}{username}{emphasisEnd} 偵測到異常活動。{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}為了您的安全，您的帳號已遭鎖定。若要取回您的帳號，請使用以下按鈕重置密碼。{paragraphEnd}

english: {paragraphStart}This button will be active for {passwordResetTicketExpirationHours} hour(s), {passwordResetTicketExpirationMinutes} minute(s).{paragraphEnd}
translation: {paragraphStart}此按鈕將會在 {passwordResetTicketExpirationHours} 小時 {passwordResetTicketExpirationMinutes} 分鐘內有效。{paragraphEnd}

description: Deprecated by Description.Email.Footer.V2.
english: You are receiving this email because the Roblox team has detected unusual activity on your account. To keep your account secure, please click the button above to reset your password. If you are unable to reset your password within 30 days of receiving this email and we continue to observe suspicious activity on your account, you may be required to reset your password at login. To ensure that this does not happen again, please enable 2-Step Verification in your account settings. Official Roblox emails only come from @roblox.com email addresses. Do not open or click any emails regarding your Roblox account from a different address.
translation: 您因 Roblox 在您的帳號偵測到異常活動而收到此電子郵件。為了保護您的帳號，請按下上方按鈕重置您的密碼。若您無法在收到此電子郵件的 30 天內重置您的密碼，而我們持續在您的帳號偵測到異常活動，您將需要在登入時重置您的密碼。為了避免此情況發生，請在帳號設定內啟用雙步驟驗證。官方 Roblox 電子郵件只會從 @roblox.com 結尾的電子郵件地址傳送，若您收到非 @roblox.com 結尾的電子郵件地址傳送與您的 Roblox 帳號相關的電子郵件，請勿將其開啟。

description: Supersedes Description.Email.Footer.
english: You are receiving this email because the Roblox team has locked your account due to suspicious activity. To access your account, please reset your password by clicking the button above. To ensure that this does not happen again, please enable 2-Step Verification in account settings. Official Roblox emails only come from @roblox.com email addresses. Do not open or click any emails regarding your Roblox account from a different address.
translation: 您好，Roblox 在您的帳號偵測到異常活動而鎖定了您的帳號。若要進入您的帳號，請按下上方按鈕重置您的密碼。為了避免此情況發生，請在帳號設定內啟用雙步驟驗證。官方 Roblox 電子郵件只會從 @roblox.com 結尾的電子郵件地址傳送，請勿開啟其他電子郵件地址傳送與您的 Roblox 帳號相關的電子郵件。

translation: 動作請求：保護您的 Roblox 帳號
保護您的 Roblox 帳號

english: {paragraphStart}We have detected unusual activity on your Roblox account: {emphasisStart}{username}{emphasisEnd}.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}To secure your account, please reset your password by clicking the button below.{paragraphEnd}

english: {paragraphStart}This button will be active for {passwordResetTicketExpirationHours} hour(s), {passwordResetTicketExpirationMinutes} minute(s).{paragraphEnd}

english: You are receiving this email because the Roblox team has locked your account due to suspicious activity. To access your account, please reset your password by clicking the button above. To ensure that this does not happen again, please enable 2-Step Verification in account settings. Official Roblox emails only come from @roblox.com email addresses. Do not open or click any emails regarding your Roblox account from a different address.
translation: 您好，Roblox 在您的帳號偵測到異常活動而鎖定了您的帳號。若要進入您的帳號，請按下上方按鈕重置您的密碼。為了避免此情況發生，請在帳號設定內啟用雙步驟驗證。官方 Roblox 電子郵件只會從 @roblox.com 結尾的電子郵件地址傳送，請勿開啟其他電子郵件地址傳送與您的 Roblox 帳號相關的電子郵件。

description: Submits the developer questionnaire answers to the backend
Changes the section on the developer questionnaire to the next section
Changes the section in developer questionnaire to the previous section
Success message for questionnaires that have been submitted on the developer questionnaire
english: Your questionnaire has been successfully submitted.

description: Error message shown at bottom of questionnaire if any network error when talking to the API.
english: Something went wrong! Try again later. (status code {status})
translation: 發生錯誤！請稍後再試。（狀態碼 {status}）

english: This game is not eligible for filling out the questionnaire at this time
translation: 此遊戲目前不符填寫問卷的資格

english: Your questionnaire has been successfully saved.
An unknown error occurred, please try again later.
translation: 發生未知錯誤，請稍後再試。

english: An invalid questionnaire id was provided.
A section was missing in the submitted response.
translation: 送出的回答中有未填項目。

english: A question had answers submitted multiple times.
translation: 您對一個問題提供了多次回答。

english: You have already completed the questionnaire but can retake it at any time.
translation: 您已完成問卷，但您可以隨時重新填寫。

english: You started but have not completed the questionnaire.
translation: 您已開始填寫問卷，但尚未完成。

english: You have not yet taken the questionnaire.

translation: 須為有效電子郵件地址

english: Your experience is compliant in all regions
translation: 您的體驗符合所有區域法規

english: For compliance reasons, if your experience has these elements and does not respect the {policyLinkStart}policy APIs{policyLinkEnd} we need to make your experience unavailable in certain regions. By submitting this questionnaire you will be making your experience unavailable in the regions listed below.
translation: 因法律關係，如果您的體驗有這些元素並違反{policyLinkStart}政策 API{policyLinkEnd}，我們將無法在部分地區開放您的體驗。您送出問卷後，您的體驗將不會在下列地區開放。

english: This game is not eligible to see or use this feature.
translation: 此遊戲沒有資格查看或使用此功能。

english: Fill out this questionnaire to generate suitability guidelines for your experience. These guidelines will be used to ensure your experience is compliant in all jurisdictions.
translation: 填寫此問卷即可獲得體驗的合適性指南，合適性指南將會用在確保您的體驗符合各地法規。

english: Note: If an update to your experience will change your answer to any questions, you are required to retake the questionnaire.
translation: 注意：如果問卷答案會因體驗更新而改變，您將必須重填問卷。

english: Learn about our {linkStart}policy APIs{linkEnd} here that allow you to make your experience dynamically compliant.
translation: 前往{linkStart}政策 API{linkEnd} 頁面了解如何讓體驗動態地符合各地法規。

english: For compliance reasons, if your experience has these elements and does not respect the {linkStart}policy APIs{linkEnd} we need to make your experience unavailable in certain regions. By submitting this questionnaire you will be making your experience unavailable in the regions listed below.
translation: 因法規關係，如果您的體驗有這些元素並違反{linkStart}政策 API{linkEnd}，我們將無法在部分地區開放您的體驗。您送出問卷後，您的體驗將不會在下列地區開放。

english: You will preview content moderation or restrictions that will be applied to your experience in affected regions before you submit. These restrictions will only take effect after you submit the form.
translation: 您送出問卷前將可以預覽體驗在受影響區域所受到的內容過濾或限制。這些限制只會在送出問卷後生效。

english: Agree to the Terms of Use and acknowledge the Privacy Policy
translation: 同意使用條款和隱私權政策

english: SIGN UP AND START HAVING FUN!
Please agree to all of the following:
Please choose from one of the following options:
translation: 請從下列選項選擇一項：

english: Agree to the {termsOfUseLink} and acknowledge the {privacyPolicyLink}
I am the parent or legal guardian of the proposed user and agree to the following:
translation: 我是該使用者的家長或法定監護人，並同意以下事項：

english: If you are signing up to Roblox on behalf of someone else, please use their birthday and gender below.
translation: 若您在為他人註冊 Roblox 帳號，請在下方使用對方的生日和性別。

english: Please have your parent choose from one of the following options:
translation: 請讓您的家長從下列選項選擇一項：

english: Please select one of the following ways to verify your identity:
translation: 請選擇一個方式驗證您的身分：

english: Please have your parent choose from one of the following options:
translation: 請讓您的家長從下列選項選擇一項：

description: Header of dialog
Continue as a button text

english: Heads up Robloxian - by clicking "continue" you will be redirected to a third-party ID verification website. Please note that the website is not affiliated with or owned or operated by Roblox and that the services under the website are provided under and subject to the separate terms and conditions of the third-party service.
translation: 請注意，您按下「繼續」後將會前往 Roblox 以外的第三方身分驗證網站。該網站非由 Roblox 擁有或控制，也和 Roblox 沒有關係。網站供應的服務會受到第三方服務個別的條款與政策管轄。

english: The system failed to verify your ID. Please try again
translation: 系統無法驗證您的身分，請重新嘗試

english: Before continuing, please verify your identity
translation: 若要繼續，請先確認您的身分

english:
VERIFY YOUR ACCOUNT
 AND START HAVING FUN!
translation:
驗證帳號
開始玩樂！

english: Your browser is up to date
translation: 您的瀏覽器已是最新版本

english: To continue using the Roblox website, please use one of the following browsers:
translation: 若要繼續使用 Roblox 網站，請使用下列瀏覽器：

english: You can use Roblox's latest features!
translation: 您可以使用 Roblox 最新的功能！

english: On July 7th 2021, Roblox will no longer support Internet Explorer. Add your email address or phone number in Account Settings so that you don’t get locked out. For more information about supported browsers, please visit Computer Hardware and Operating System Requirements.
translation: Roblox 在 2021 年 7 月 7 日將停止支援 Internet Explorer。為了確保您可以存取您的帳號，請在帳號設定頁面新增電子郵件或手機號碼。若要獲得更多關於支援的瀏覽器的資訊，請前往電腦硬體和作業系統需求協助文章。

description: Used to to describe to a user an 'edit' action. Could be used in the context of an action button, or as a heading to denote that you are on the 'edit' / configure page
Used to communicate a "save" action, meaning data will be saved/updated to a database
ex. Search decals, search plugins

english: This game is not eligible to see or use this feature.
translation: 此遊戲沒有資格查看或使用此功能。

english: Content ratings is a new feature we are launching that allows you to fill a short survey and then receive ratings for your game.
translation: 內容分級是我們新推出的功能，讓您可以填寫簡短的問卷後為遊戲獲得分級。

english: If you have completed the questionnaire, you should see a list of all your ratings below after a few minutes. If you do not see it, please check again later as it may not have finished processing yet.
translation: 若您已完成問卷，您幾分鐘後將會看到含有所有分級的清單。若該清單尚未出現，請等處理完畢再回來查看。

english: Something went wrong! Try again later. (status code {status})
translation: 發生錯誤！請稍後再試。（狀態碼 {status}）

english: Take the questionnaire below to obtain a rating for your game.
translation: 填寫以下問卷即可為體驗獲得分級。

english: Your questionnaire response has been submitted, but you have not yet been assigned ratings. This is likely due to processing time, please check back later. If it has been more than 7 days, please contact us.
translation: 您的問卷回答已送出，但您尚未獲得分級。我們還需要一點處理時間，請稍後再查看。若您超過 7 天未獲得分級，請直接聯絡我們。

english: Questionnaire has not yet been submitted.

description: Used in form control input labels if an input is left with an empty string that is not allowed
Used for form labels on items that can be activated/deactivated (i.e. dev badges). Paired with a toggle input usually.
Moderation message depicted alongside form image uploaders to let users know that their uploaded files will be reviewed first before they can be viewed.
english: Image will be reviewed by moderators before being made visible to other users.
translation: 上傳的圖像將先由管理員審核，才會開放其他使用者檢視.

description: Message depicted alongside image uploaders to let users know what the max image dimensions are
Used alongside image uploaders to depict the list of accepted filetypes a user can upload
Used in alert dialogs if a user attempts to redirect from a form before saving. Prompt asks the user if they want to save before losing changes.
english: Do you want to save the changes before leaving?

description: Used alongside a file uploader to communicate to the user that an incorrect mime type has been uploaded.
Used alongside a file uploader to let a user know if they uploaded a file that is too big
english: Max File Size of {maxFileSize} bytes exceeded.
translation: 已超過 {maxFileSize} 檔案大小上限。

description: Used for drop-zone style image uploaders to indicate where a user can upload a file to.
Message to display as the heading of the alert dialog asking if user wants to save changes before leaving (take two since first attempt bugged out)
Error message when icon and details patch requests fail for a particular asset type
english: Error occurred when trying to update both the details and icon for the {itemType}
translation: 更新{itemType}的詳細資料和圖示時發生錯誤

description: Patch request error for when metadata updates fail for an asset (i.e. name, description, etc.)
english: An error occurred when trying to update one or more details for the {itemType}
translation: 更新{itemType}的部分詳細資料時發生錯誤

description: Patch request error message specifically for when an Icon update fails
english: An error occurred while trying to update the icon for the {itemType}
translation: 更新{itemType}的圖示時發生錯誤

translation: 為了確保帳號安全，請{styleTagStart}點擊此處{styleTagEnd}立刻變更您的密碼。

english: Keep Your Account Safe With 2-Step Verification Via Authenticator
translation: 使用驗證器雙步驟驗證，確保帳號安全

english: Keep Your Account Safe With Authenticator
translation: 使用驗證器，確保帳號安全

english: We recommend that you enable 2-Step Verification via an authenticator app to make your account more secure. This would help keep your account safe even if your password or email is stolen. If your account is compromised, Customer Support will evaluate the security measures you put in place as we try to help you recover any lost value. Learn more on our {linkStart}help page{linkEnd}.
translation: 為了確保帳號安全，我們推薦您啟用驗證器 App 雙步驟驗證。如果您的密碼或電子郵件信箱遭到竊取，您的帳號依然會受到保護。如果您的帳號遭到侵入，客服團隊在嘗試復原您的帳號內容時也會檢查您所採用的安全措施。請前往{linkStart}協助頁面{linkEnd}了解更多資訊。

english: We recommend that you enable 2-Step Verification via an authenticator app to keep your account safe. If your account is compromised, Customer Support will evaluate the security measures you put in place as we try to help you recover any lost value. Learn more on our {linkStart}help page{linkEnd}.
translation: 為了確保帳號安全，我們推薦您啟用驗證器 App 雙步驟驗證。如果您的帳號遭到侵入，客服團隊在嘗試復原您的帳號內容時也會檢查您所採用的安全措施。請前往{linkStart}協助頁面{linkEnd}了解更多資訊。

english: The information collected through the ID verification process will only be used for the purposes of securing your account and/or enabling Roblox features.  Roblox takes steps to ensure that all service providers with access to Roblox personal information are capable of protecting the information we share with them.  Our service providers are only allowed to use the personal information with them for the specific tasks they’ve been hired to do that are consistent with our Privacy Policy. Our services providers are not permitted to sell the personal information shared with them.  For more information, please visit our
translation: ID 驗證過程收集的資訊只會用在保護您的帳號或啟用 Roblox 功能上。Roblox 會確保所有擁有 Roblox 個人資訊存取權限的服務供應商有能力保護所分享的資訊。我們的服務供應商只能在隱私權政策許可之下使用個人資訊完成指定工作。我們不允許服務供應商出售所分享的個人資訊。若要了解更多資訊，請參閱

For more information, please visit our {spanStart} Roblox Biometric Privacy Notice.{spanEnd}

You are about to change a birthday that has been verified.
 
If you change your date of birth now, you will not be able to verify your age again, and you will lose access to age restricted features. THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE. Are you sure you want to proceed?

您即將變更已驗證的生日。

若您現在變更生日，您將無法重新驗證年齡，並會失去年齡限定功能的使用權。此動作無法復原。確定繼續？

english: Sorry, your verification was declined. For security reasons, please wait {days} day(s) before trying again.
translation: 對不起，您的驗證遭到拒絕。為了安全考量，請等 {days} 天後再重新嘗試。

english: Roblox is committed to making its websites usable by all people, including those with disabilities by meeting or exceeding the requirements of the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1 Level A/AA (WCAG 2.1 A/AA).  We strive to make our sites an equal experience for everyone.{lineBreak}We continue to monitor our sites and make sure that all content provided is accessible to all visitors.  In order to help us in this process, we have engaged {linkStart}The Bureau of Internet Accessibility{linkEnd}, an accessibility consulting company, to conduct a full accessibility audit consisting of both automated and manual testing of our websites using BoIA’s A11Y® platform which provides us with specific recommendations that will assist us in ensuring that our Web presence is in conformance with the WCAG 2.1 A/AA.
translation: Roblox 致力讓所有人都可以順暢使用我們網站，也為了殘障人士符合或超過無障礙網頁規範 2.1 等級 A/AA（WCAG 2.1 A/AA）的標準。我們希望所有人都可以在 Roblox 的網站上獲得相同品質的體驗。{lineBreak}我們會持續觀察我們的網站，確保所有訪客都可以順暢使用所有內容。為了達成此目標，我們請了無障礙諮詢公司 {linkStart}The Bureau of Internet Accessibility{linkEnd} 為我們進行全面的無障礙審查，包括使用該公司的 A11Y® 平台進行自動和手動測試，並獲得符合 WCAG 2.1 A/AA 的相關指導。

english: It is important to note that efforts to the websites are ongoing as we work to implement the relevant improvements to meet WCAG 2.1 A/AA guidelines over time.
translation: 請注意，我們還在持續為了符合 WCAG 2.1 A/AA 而改良我們的網站。

english: While you are visiting our sites, you will notice that we make use of third-party sites such as Facebook, Instagram, Glassdoor, Twitch, YouTube, LinkedIn and Twitter to provide information about Roblox.  Though individuals may have challenges with access to these particular sites, Roblox does not control or remedy the way content is portrayed.
translation: 您參訪我們的網站時將會注意到我們會運用 Facebook、Instagram、Glassdoor、Twitch、LinkedIn、Twitter 等第三方網站提供更多 Roblox 的相關資訊。部分人士可能無法順暢使用所有網站，但 Roblox 無法控制或改善內容的呈現方式。

english: Warning: Excessive experience use can interfere with normal daily life. You have played on Roblox for {NumberOfHours} hour(s).
translation: 警告：體驗時間過長將會影響生活品質。您在 Roblox 的遊戲時間已達 {NumberOfHours} 小時。

Privacy Policy url text

english: What data does this company collect?
translation: 此公司會收集什麼資料？

english: We use cookies to personalize and enhance your experience on our site. Visit our {privacyPolicyLink} for more information on our data collections practices. By clicking Accept, you agree to our use of cookies for the purposes listed in the settings. To see a complete list of the companies that use these cookies and other technologies and to tell us whether they can be used on your device or not, access our Cookie Consent Tool. Your will see this message only once, but you will always be able to set your preferences at any time in the Cookie Consent Tool.
translation: 我們會使用 Cookie 讓您在我們的網站上享有更加個人化、更完美的體驗。若要了解更多關於我們的資料收集作業的資訊，請前往 {privacyPolicyLink}。您按下接受即同意我們為了設定內描述的用途使用 Cookie。若要查看使用這些 Cookie 和其他技術的完整公司清單，並告訴我們能否在您的裝置上使用這些 Cookie 和技術，請使用我們的 Cookie 權限工具。此訊息只會出現一次，但您隨時可以使用 Cookie 權限工具設定偏好。

english: We want to be transparent about the data we and our partners collect and how we use it, so you can best exercise control over your personal data. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy.
translation: 為了讓您充分掌握您的個人資料，我們會公開我們與合作左半收集的個人資料和其使用方式。若要了解更多資訊，請查看我們的隱私權政策。

english: We use this information to improve the performance and experience of our site visitors. This includes improving search results, showing more relevant content and promotional materials, better communication, and improved site performance.
translation: 我們會用此資訊給予網站參訪人更好的效能和體驗，其中包括優化搜尋結果、顯示更多符合使用者的內容和促銷資訊、更好的交流及更高的網站效能。

english: Google Analytics provides companies insights into their website traffic and marketing effectiveness. Google Analytics helps determine the right keywords, target the best markets, and engage and convert more customers.
translation: Google Analytics 會提供公司網路流量和行銷效益的數據。Google Analytics 會提供最佳關鍵字、最佳市場、客戶觸及和轉換等服務。

english: Aggregate data is shared with 3rd parties, Anonymous data is shared with 3rd parties, PII data is shared with 3rd parties, Sensitive data is shared with 3rd parties.
translation: 整合資料將分享給第三方、匿名資料將分享給第三方、個人資料將分享給第三方、敏感資料將分享給第三方。

english: As long as necessary to fulfill a business need or as required by law.
translation: 依公司作業需要此資料的時間而定，或依法律而定。

english: Ad Serving, Ad Targeting, Analytics/Measurement, Content Customization, Cross Device Tracking, Optimization
translation: 刊登廣告、指定廣告、分析和測量、自訂內容、跨裝置追蹤、最佳化

english: We use the following third parties to better improve your experience on Roblox. They may use cookies and other mechanisms to track usage statistics on our website. You may opt-out of this information collection by turning the analytics toggle to the off position.
translation: 我們會透過以下第三方夥伴改良您在 Roblox 的體驗。他們可能會使用 Cookie 和其他手段在我們的網站上追蹤使用數據。若您不想要我們的夥伴收集您的資訊，您可以關閉分析數據選項。

english: Hi Dev, We received a right-of-erasure-request for the following User ID(s): {{{{UserId}}}} Please delete this User ID immediately from all of your records (e.g. games, data stores, etc.) from the following Game(s): {{{{Places}}}} This is an obligation under data protection laws. If you would like more information about how to delete a User ID from a data store, please visit our Developer Hub at https://developer.roblox.com/articles/Data-store , https://developer.roblox.com/api-reference/class/GlobalDataStore and https://developer.roblox.com/en-us/articles/managing-personal-information. Please note that you must delete the User ID from all of your records, and not just from your data stores. The pages linked above are provided for informational purposes and are not intended to provide a comprehensive method of deleting User IDs. Regards, The Roblox Team
translation: 親愛的開發者您好，我們收到了使用者 ID {{{{UserId}}}} 行使抹除權的請求。請在遊戲 {{{{Places}}}} 的所有紀錄（遊戲、資料庫等）中刪除此使用者 ID。依資料保護法規定，您必須採取此行動。如果您需要更多關於如何在資料庫中刪除使用者 ID 的資訊，請參閱以下開發者中心連結：https://developer.roblox.com/articles/Data-store、https://developer.roblox.com/api-reference/class/GlobalDataStore 及 https://developer.roblox.com/en-us/articles/managing-personal-information。除了資料庫，您還必須在所有紀錄中刪除此使用者 ID。上述連結的資訊僅作參考用，並未完全說明刪除使用者 ID 的方式。謝謝您，Roblox 團隊
【重要】行使抹除權：請立刻採取行動
